title: Hyperliquid whale still holds 10% of JELLY memecoin after $6.2M exploit
body: A crypto whale who allegedly manipulated the prize of the Jelly my Jelly (JELLY) memecoin on decentralized exchange Hyperliquid still holds nearly $2 million worth of the token, according to blockchain analysts. The unidentified whale made at least $6.26 million in profit by exploiting the liquidation parameters on Hyperliquid. According to a postmortem report by blockchain intelligence firm Arkham, the whale opened three large trading positions within five minutes: two long positions worth $2.15 million and $1.9 million, and a $4.1 million short position that effectively offset the longs . Source: Arkham When the price of JELLY rose by 400%, the $4 million short position wasn‚Äôt immediately liquidated due to its size. Instead, it was absorbed into the Hyperliquidity Provider Vault (HLP), which is designed to liquidate large positions. Related: Polymarket faces scrutiny over $7M Ukraine mineral deal bet In more troubling revelations, the entity may still be holding nearly $2 million worth of the token‚Äôs supply, according to blockchain investigator ZachXBT. ‚ÄúFive addresses linked to the entity who manipulated JELLY on Hyperliquid still hold ~10% of the JELLY supply on Solana ($1.9M+). All JELLY was purchased since March 22, 2025,‚Äù he wrote in a March 26 Telegram post. The entity continues selling the tokens despite Hyperliquid freezing and delisting the memecoin , citing ‚Äúevidence of suspicious market activity‚Äù involving trading instruments. The JELLY token‚Äôs collapse is the latest in a series of memecoin scandals and insider schemes looking to capitalize on investor hype. Source: Bubblemaps The exploit occurred only two weeks after a Wolf of Wall Street-inspired memecoin ‚Äî launched by the Official Melania Meme (MELANIA) and Libra (LIBRA) token co-creator Hayden Davis ‚Äî crashed over 99% after launching with an 80% insider supply. WOLF/SOL, market cap, 1-hour chart. Source: Dexscreener Related: Polymarket whale raises Trump odds, sparking manipulation concerns Lessons from the JELLY memecoin meltdown: ‚Äúhype without fundamentals‚Äù ‚ÄúThe JELLY incident is a clear reminder that hype without fundamentals doesn‚Äôt last,‚Äù according to Alvin Kan, chief operating officer at Bitget Wallet. ‚ÄúIn DeFi, momentum can drive short-term attention, but it doesn‚Äôt build sustainable platforms,‚Äù Kan told Cointelegraph, adding: ‚ÄúProjects built on speculation, not utility, will continue to get exposed ‚Äî especially in a market where capital moves quickly and unforgivingly.‚Äù While Hyperliquid‚Äôs response cushioned short-term damage, it raises further questions about decentralization, as similar interventions ‚Äúblur the line between decentralized ethos and centralized control.‚Äù The Hyper Foundation, Hyperliquid‚Äôs ecosystem nonprofit, will ‚Äúautomatically‚Äù reimburse most affected users for losses related to the incident, except the addresses belonging to the exploiter. Magazine: Memecoins are ded ‚Äî But Solana ‚Äò100x better‚Äô despite revenue plunge

title: Wyoming Stablecoin: Chainalysis, Inca Digital Selected to Help Detect Illicit Use of WYST
body: The U.S. state of Wyoming has identified nine candidate blockchains to host its upcoming stablecoin, dubbed WYST. title: Decoding Bitcoin Season: Altcoin Season Index Plunges to 19 ‚Äì Is Bitcoin Dominance Here to Stay?
body: The cryptocurrency market is a dynamic beast, constantly shifting its allegiance between Bitcoin and the vast array of altcoins. Right now, the spotlight is firmly fixed on Bitcoin. The latest reading from the CoinMarketCap (CMC) Altcoin Season Index is flashing a clear signal: it‚Äôs Bitcoin Season . What is the Altcoin Season Index and Why Does it Matter? The Altcoin Season Index , a crucial tool for crypto traders and enthusiasts, isn‚Äôt just another arbitrary number. It‚Äôs a meticulously calculated metric designed to gauge the prevailing sentiment and momentum within the crypto market. Think of it as a compass, pointing towards whether altcoins or Bitcoin are leading the charge. This index helps you understand the current market dynamics and potentially strategize your investment decisions. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of what you need to know about the Altcoin Season Index : Data Source: It‚Äôs tracked by CoinMarketCap (CMC), a reputable source for cryptocurrency data. Scope: The index analyzes the top 100 cryptocurrencies listed on CMC, excluding stablecoins and wrapped tokens to provide a pure reflection of market sentiment. Timeframe: It assesses coin performance over the past 90 days, giving a medium-term perspective on market trends. Scoring: The index ranges from 1 to 100. Altcoin Season Definition: An Altcoin Season is declared when at least 75% of the top 100 coins have outperformed Bitcoin in the last 90 days. Bitcoin Season Definition: Conversely, a Bitcoin Season emerges when 25% or fewer of these coins have outperformed Bitcoin during the same period. Currently, the Altcoin Season Index sits at a mere 19, as of 00:30 UTC on March 27. This low score emphatically confirms that we are indeed in a Bitcoin Season . The index even nudged up two points from the previous day, further solidifying Bitcoin‚Äôs current dominance. Decoding Bitcoin Season: What Does an Index of 19 Really Mean for the Crypto Market? An Altcoin Season Index reading of 19 is a strong indicator of Bitcoin dominance . It signifies that Bitcoin is not just holding its ground, but actively outperforming the vast majority of altcoins in the market. But what are the underlying implications of this? Let‚Äôs break down the significance of Bitcoin Season : Capital Flow to Bitcoin: During Bitcoin Season , investors often rotate their capital back into Bitcoin, perceived as a safer and more established cryptocurrency, especially during times of market uncertainty or consolidation. Altcoin Underperformance: While Bitcoin thrives, many altcoins may experience slower growth or even price corrections as investor attention and capital shift towards Bitcoin. Market Sentiment: A Bitcoin Season can reflect a cautious or risk-off sentiment in the broader crypto market. Investors may be prioritizing security and established assets like Bitcoin over the higher volatility and potentially higher risk associated with altcoins. Potential for Future Altcoin Surge: Interestingly, Bitcoin Seasons don‚Äôt last forever. They can often pave the way for future Altcoin Seasons . As Bitcoin consolidates or corrects after a period of dominance, profits can then flow back into altcoins, potentially triggering a new altcoin rally. Is Bitcoin Dominance a Threat or an Opportunity? Whether Bitcoin dominance , as indicated by the Altcoin Season Index , is a threat or an opportunity largely depends on your perspective and investment strategy. For Bitcoin maximalists and long-term Bitcoin holders: This is often seen as a positive sign, reinforcing Bitcoin‚Äôs position as the king of crypto and validating its store of value narrative. For altcoin enthusiasts and traders: A prolonged Bitcoin Season might seem less exciting. However, it presents unique opportunities: Accumulate Altcoins at Lower Prices: During Bitcoin Season , many fundamentally strong altcoins may become undervalued. This could be an opportune time to strategically accumulate them for the next potential altcoin rally. Focus on Bitcoin Trading: Traders can capitalize on Bitcoin‚Äôs price movements and volatility during its dominant phase. Identify Strong Altcoins: Even in Bitcoin Season , some altcoins may still outperform. Identifying these resilient projects can lead to significant gains. Research is key to finding these gems. Actionable Insights: Navigating the Crypto Market in Bitcoin Season So, how can you navigate the crypto waters during a Bitcoin Season ? Here are some actionable insights: Reassess Your Portfolio: Evaluate your crypto portfolio in light of the current Bitcoin Season . Are you overweight in altcoins? Consider rebalancing to align with the prevailing market trend. Monitor the Altcoin Season Index: Keep a close eye on the Altcoin Season Index . A rising index could signal a shift towards altcoin momentum. Research and Due Diligence: Whether you‚Äôre focusing on Bitcoin or exploring undervalued altcoins, thorough research is paramount. Understand the fundamentals, technology, and adoption of any cryptocurrency before investing. Manage Risk: The crypto market is inherently volatile. Implement robust risk management strategies, including diversification and setting stop-loss orders. Stay Informed: The crypto landscape evolves rapidly. Stay updated on market news, regulatory developments, and technological advancements to make informed decisions. Conclusion: Embracing the Dynamic Nature of the Crypto Market The Altcoin Season Index serves as a valuable reminder of the cyclical nature of the cryptocurrency market. Bitcoin Seasons and Altcoin Seasons are part of this fascinating ebb and flow. Understanding these dynamics, utilizing tools like the Altcoin Season Index , and adapting your strategies accordingly are crucial for navigating the crypto market successfully. While Bitcoin dominance may be the current theme, the crypto narrative is constantly unfolding, promising exciting shifts and opportunities in the future. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: SuperTrend Analysis: Dogecoin May Enter Bullish Territory If It Surpasses $0.21
body: Dogecoin (DOGE), the leading memecoin in the cryptocurrency market, is showing signs of a potential bullish trend following a significant 16% price recovery. Analysts suggest that for Dogecoin to solidify this upward momentum, it must surpass a crucial resistance level. Dogecoin Eyes New Bullish Trend Amid Market Recovery The recent price movements of Dogecoin have been influenced by broader market trends and macroeconomic factors, particularly the fallout from President Donald Trump‚Äôs tariff policies. After reaching a yearly high of $0.4350 on January 18, Dogecoin experienced a dramatic decline, plummeting 67% to a low of $0.1430 on March 11. However, the recent positive performance indicates that a new bullish wave may be emerging. Related Reading: Dogecoin Price Prediction: Analyst says There Is 100% Chance Of A Bullish Rally, Here‚Äôs Why Market analyst Ali Martinez has pointed in a recent social media post on X (formerly Twitter) to the SuperTrend indicator, a technical analysis tool that helps identify price trends, suggesting that Dogecoin could enter a bullish phase if it successfully breaks through the resistance level at $0.21. The analyst further identified the key support floor for the Dogecoin price at $0.177, which will be crucial in determining whether the token can sustain its recovery or if it will face another downtrend. Should Dogecoin fail to hold this support level, it could revisit once again the $0.14 price point, where significant buying pressure previously helped support the price. This scenario could erase the gains made over the last two weeks. Eyeing $0.50 And Potential All-Time High Of $1.60 Adding weight to Martinez‚Äôs analysis, data from Glassnode reveals that 7% of Dogecoin‚Äôs total supply is concentrated at the $0.20 mark, which is the third-largest concentration after $0.17 and $0.07. According to Glassnode, this concentration suggests that the $0.20 level may act as a formidable resistance point in the near term, as many wallets likely acquired their holdings at lower prices. In a more positive note for the token and despite the current uncertainties surrounding Dogecoin‚Äôs price, analysts remain optimistic about the memecoin‚Äôs long-term prospects. Related Reading: Bitcoin Marks 114 Weeks In Active Buy Signal On The SuperTrend Weekly, But Things Could Turn Bad If This Happens According to experts like AMCrypto, Dogecoin has recently tested a multi-year support trendline, indicating a potential for sustained upward movement. ‚ÄúMemes are slowly moving up now, and I expect DOGE to lead the rally,‚Äù one analyst stated, setting a target of $0.50 in the second quarter of the year. Other analysts, including ChartingGuy, have suggested that Dogecoin could aim for a new all-time high of $1.60, representing a staggering potential increase of 742% from its current levels and surpassing its previous record of $0.7316. Featured image from DALL-E, chart from TradingView.com

title: Italy goes after Meta, X and LinkedIn in landmark tax payment case
body: Italian tax authorities have demanded Meta, X, and LinkedIn pay value-added tax (VAT) claims, according to a Wednesday Reuters report, citing four sources familiar with the matter. The case will become the first attempt in the European Union (EU) jurisdiction to apply VAT laws to social media platforms offering free services in exchange for user data. Italy is seeking ‚Ç¨887.6 million ($961 million) in taxes from Meta, ‚Ç¨12.5 million from X, and around ‚Ç¨140 million from LinkedIn. Per Reuters, the figures represent the entire period under investigation , which varies by company but spans from 2015-2016 to 2021-2022. Still, the current tax assessment only covers 2015 and 2016, as claims for those years are set to expire. Why Italian tax authorities want social platforms to pay levies The case hangs on a legal argument that when users sign up for platforms like Facebook, X, or LinkedIn, they are effectively engaging in a barter transaction. Under EU VAT law, taxable transactions require a supply of goods or services for consideration. Italian authorities are convinced that users are offering non-monetary consideration by providing personal data in exchange for access to social media platforms, making the transaction subject to VAT. Investigations into Meta and X for alleged tax fraud had been previously reported, but the inclusion of Microsoft‚Äôs LinkedIn unit in the case was not publicly known until now. Mark Zuckerberg and his team have yet to comment on case specifics, but they insisted they will cooperate fully with authorities in accordance with EU and local laws. The company also opposed the idea that providing access to online platforms should be subject to VAT. LinkedIn told Reuters that it had ‚Äúnothing to share at this time.‚Äù Elon Musk and X have not made any statement on the matter either. Legal proceedings with big repercussions Legal and tax experts suggest that if Italy‚Äôs approach is upheld, it could impact several businesses that keep user data across the EU, including airlines, supermarkets, and publishers. Any company linking free services to data collection could face similar tax liabilities. The three social media companies have 60 days to appeal before a judicial process can formally begin. If they request a settlement proposal from tax authorities, they will be granted an additional month, during which time three outcomes could follow. One option is for the companies to challenge the claims in court, a process that could take up to a decade given Italy‚Äôs three-tiered judicial system. Another possibility is for the Italian Revenue Agency to drop its claim, either for technical reasons or due to political considerations. Alternatively, a partial settlement could be reached and payments made while Italy seeks a ruling from the European Commission on a more defined legal framework. Italy freezes Starlink negotiations Italy and Starlink Service LLC CEO Elon Musk have a good relationship, although it may turn sour soon because of the trade tariff wars between the EU and the US. Italian Defense Minister Guido Crosetto confirmed in an interview with La Repubblica on March 22 that Italy has halted negotiations with SpaceX over a potential Starlink agreement. According to a Ukrainian local news outlet, European officials fear the US could use control over Starlink to twist the hand of Kyiv into decisions favoring Russia and a reported minerals deal with Washington. On March 9, Musk denied that Starlink would be cut off from Ukraine, clashing with Polish Foreign Minister Radoslaw Sikorski over the legitimacy of these fears. ‚Äú To be extremely clear, no matter how much I disagree with the Ukraine policy, Starlink will never turn off its terminals ,‚Äù Musk stated. Earlier this year, the Italian government was supportive of working with Starlink, but political opposition derailed discussions. ‚Äú It seems to me that everything has stopped ‚Ä¶ the topic has moved from Starlink to the statements of and about the person ,‚Äù Crosetto said. Negotiations are purportedly now on hold, and the Italian government wants security considerations in its defence contracts heard before making any deal. ‚Äú When the controversy and the times have calmed down, there will be a technical approach ,‚Äù the Italian Defence minister reckoned. title: Bitget Lists Walrus (WAL) in the Innovation and Web3 Zone
body: Victoria, Seychelles, March 27th, 2025, Chainwire Victoria, Seychelles, 27th March 2025 ‚Äì Bitget , the leading cryptocurrency exchange and Web3 company, has announced the listing of Walrus (WAL) on its platform. Trading for WAL/USDT will commence on 27 March 2025, 10:00 (UTC), with a deposit available now and a withdrawal available on 28 March 2025, 11:00 (UTC). Walrus is a decentralized storage network that stores and delivers raw data and media files, including videos, images, and PDFs. Walrus splits data into small pieces and distributes them across multiple nodes globally, ensuring data availability even in challenging situations. Built on the Sui Network with smart contracts, Walrus improves on protocols like Filecoin and Arweave for programmable, scalable storage. Metadata and proof of availability are stored on Sui, allowing users to leverage the composability, expressivity, and security offered by Sui and the Move programming language. Storage capacity can be tokenized and used as a programmable asset, allowing developers to integrate storage with apps on Sui. However, Walrus isn't limited to Sui, it's available to builders on other blockchains like Solana and Ethereum. The inclusion of Walrus provides an opportunity for users to engage with an innovative decentralized storage project enhancing data security and accessibility. It expands Bitget's portfolio of assets available in the Innovation and Web3 Zone, underlining the platform's commitment to offering promising projects which aligns with user needs and decentralized principles of blockchain technology. The Walrus listing further enriches the portfolio of assets available in the Innovation and Meme Zone, a segment customized for tokens that show creativity and cultural relevance. Bitget continues to position itself as a hub for innovative digital assets, enabling users to explore new opportunities in a fast-paced and ever-changing market. title: HashKey Launches Crypto Exchange Ratings in Hong Kong to Boost Transparency
body: HashKey Launches Crypto Ratings Initiative in Hong Kong HashKey, a Hong Kong fintech firm specializing in digital assets, has launched a new crypto and exchange rating program, developed in partnership with Hong Kong Virtual Asset Rating Company. The move is part of a process of greater transparency and regulatory alignment in the city‚Äôs nascent virtual asset market. A Step Towards Better Market Integrity Released via an X post on March 27, the project provides three core services: virtual asset ratings, exchange ratings, and virtual asset indices. The tools are designed to provide exchanges and investors with objective, quantitative benchmarks that reflect levels of risk and performance. HashKey said the aim is to encourage a cleaner, compliant trading ecosystem and facilitate Hong Kong‚Äôs positioning as a leading international center for digital assets. SFC Increases Oversight of Virtual Assets The action follows on the heels of more stringent regulatory efforts by Hong Kong‚Äôs Securities and Futures Commission (SFC). The SFC in its 2025‚Äì26 budget proposed an extra 15 positions, eight of which are aimed at regulation, enforcement, and market surveillance of virtual assets. Strategic Growth Supported by Investment HashKey recently received $30 million in funding from Gaorong Ventures, pegging the firm at $1.5 billion. This comes shortly after HashKey Capital received a license to manage crypto investment products for high-net-worth investors under the SFC regime. With the new regulatory support and strategic actions like the ratings system, HashKey is paving the way to decide the fate of crypto regulation and investor protection in Hong Kong.

title: Ripple Targets African Payment Friction with Chipper Cash Partnership
body: Ripple and Chipper Cash go into a partnership. The partnership will enhance cross-border payments across Africa. Blockchain awareness is increasing among African businesses. Ripple, the fintech firm known for its blockchain-based payment solutions, has partnered with African payments company Chipper Cash to streamline cross-border payments into and across the continent. Chipper Cash, which serves five million customers in nine African countries, will use Ripple‚Äôs payment solutions aiming to deliver faster, cheaper transactions for its users receiving funds globally, 24/7. Related: Ripple Settles SEC Fight for Less, Yet XRP Price Remains Surprisingly Calm Ripple Expands African Footprint This partnership marks a significant step in Ripple‚Äôs expansion across Africa. It comes as businesses that operate on the continent show greater interest in blockchain‚Äôs practical applications for improving financial infrastructure and payment efficiency. This is a developing story; updates will follow. Related: Ripple Expands Cross-Border Payments: New Licenses & RLUSD Stablecoin Set to Reshape 2025 The post Ripple Targets African Payment Friction with Chipper Cash Partnership appeared first on Coin Edition .

title: Good News Came From the American Giant Company for Four Altcoins Including XRP and Dogecoin (DOGE)!
body: The White House's increasing interest in Bitcoin and altcoins has also prompted the US giant company to take action. According to the official announcement, leading brokerage giant Interactive Brokers is expanding its crypto trading services by adding support for four altcoins including XRP and Solana (SOL). Accordingly, Interactive Brokers added four new altcoins to its platform: XRP, Solana (SOL), Dogecoin (DOGE), and Cardano (ADA). The giant company currently offers Bitcoin (BTC), Litecoin (LTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH) and Ethereum (ETH) services on the platform. Customers with accounts at Zero Hash LLC are offered SOL, ADA, XRP, and DOGE; customers with accounts at Paxos Trust Company are only offered SOL. ‚ÄúAdding these new altcoins gives our clients greater flexibility to diversify their portfolios and take advantage of opportunities in digital assets,‚Äù said Steve Sanders, Vice President of Marketing and Product Development at Interactive Brokers. Interactive Brokers also promises low trading fees amid an increasingly competitive crypto market. Accordingly, the company offers trading fees ranging from 0.12% to 0.18% per trade value, with a minimum of $1.75 per trade. *This is not investment advice. title: Like DOGE, XRP Going Vertical Is a Good Indicator of Market Froth, Bitcoin Peaks
body: Crypto traders are used to seeing a price surge in non-serious cryptocurrencies such as dogecoin ( DOGE ) as a sign of market froth . Now it looks as though XRP , the payments-focused cryptocurrency, can also be used as an indicator for bull-market peaks in bitcoin ( BTC ). Unlike meme tokens like DOGE and shiba inu ( SHIB ), XRP has utility. It is used by Ripple to facilitate cross-border transactions, which places it in a bucket different from the memecoins. Even so, since 2017, XRP has been a contrary indicator for bitcoin bulls, tending to rally‚Äî often soaring several hundred percent in a short time ‚Äî in the final stages of BTC bull runs, marking the point at which bitcoin ultimately peaked. XRP experienced a remarkable 10-fold rally from December 2017 to early 2018, coinciding with bitcoin's peak at around $20,000, before entering a bear market that lasted almost a year. A similar near-vertical spike in XRP occurred in early 2021, marking the peak of another bull market in bitcoin. And XRP's surge of approximately 240% in late 2024 foreshadowed bitcoin's bull market peak above $109,000, followed by a decline below $80,000. As the saying goes: "Once is happenstance, twice is a coincidence, and three times is a trend." The next time BTC is running hot, savvy traders may want to keep an eye on XRP for potential signals regarding the end of the bull run.

title: Trump vows harsher tariffs if Canada and EU unite against US
body: Trump threatened to slam Canada and the European Union with even bigger tariffs on Thursday if they work together against the United States on trade. He made the threat on Truth Social, saying both countries would face ‚Äúfar larger‚Äù penalties if they attempt to damage the American economy. ‚ÄúIf the European Union works with Canada in order to do economic harm to the USA, large scale Tariffs, far larger than currently planned, will be placed on them both in order to protect the best friend that each of those two countries has ever had!‚Äù Trump wrote . As Cryptopolitan reported , the warning came just one day after Trump announced a new 25% tariff on all vehicles not manufactured inside the U.S., which he said would go into effect on April 2. The White House confirmed the plan on Wednesday. The new tariffs will target foreign-made cars and light trucks and will pile onto the existing trade duties already enforced under Trump‚Äôs administration. Trump expands tariffs to include foreign car parts Will Scharf, a White House aide, said the new rules don‚Äôt just stop at cars. Starting in May, the administration will apply additional tariffs on engines, transmissions, and electrical parts brought in from outside the country. These components are often used in American car production. Scharf said the plan is expected to generate ‚Äúover $100 billion of new annual revenue‚Äù for the United States. After the announcement, stock markets in the U.S. and Asia dropped sharply, especially shares tied to the auto industry. European automakers were expected to follow the same trend as their markets opened Thursday morning. The decision added another layer to the global trade war that has already affected several industries and regions. Trump, who has already put duties on goods from China, Canada, and Mexico, as well as across the board on steel and aluminum, continues to argue that the U.S. is being taken advantage of by its biggest trading partners. The new auto tariffs are the latest move in what he sees as a long-overdue correction of global trade imbalances. The White House defended the policy shift by saying it would ‚Äúprotect and strengthen‚Äù the American car industry. But many analysts said this could actually hit U.S. automakers as hard as it does foreign ones. That‚Äôs because most American carmakers depend heavily on imported parts to build their vehicles domestically. EU and Canada signal retaliation plans, automakers panic Neither the EU nor Canada has confirmed that they plan to work together against the U.S., but both have made it clear that they are considering responses to Trump‚Äôs new tariffs. On Thursday, Ursula von der Leyen, President of the European Commission, said the EU will continue looking for ways to negotiate while also defending its economy. ‚ÄúWe will continue to seek negotiated solutions, while safeguarding its economic interests,‚Äù she said . ‚ÄúTariffs are taxes ‚Äî bad for businesses, worse for consumers equally in the U.S. and the European Union.‚Äù In Canada, newly elected Prime Minister Mark Carney called the new auto tariff ‚Äúa direct attack.‚Äù Speaking to reporters in Kitchener, Ontario, Carney said he planned to hold an emergency cabinet meeting that same day to decide how to respond. ‚ÄúWe will defend our workers, we will defend our companies, we will defend our country, and we will defend it together,‚Äù he said. In Europe, carmakers are already feeling the heat. The European Automobile Manufacturers‚Äô Association released a statement on Thursday saying it is ‚Äúdeeply concerned‚Äù about the move. The group said the timing couldn‚Äôt be worse, calling it ‚Äúa watershed moment for our industry‚Äôs transformation and as fierce international competition mounts.‚Äù Ludovic Subran, Chief Economist at Allianz, said on CNBC Thursday that no one should be surprised that Trump is going after the car industry. ‚ÄúCars are so political,‚Äù Subran said during the ‚ÄúSquawk Box Europe‚Äù show. He also said the industry is already under pressure, with registrations down since January. ‚ÄúYou‚Äôve seen the reaction of the stock markets, the car manufacturers. It comes at a time when there is a lot of uncertainty about car consumption, the registration of cars has slumped since the beginning of the year, so it is really another one of these major seismic waves of the Trump administration.‚Äù While Trump pushes ahead, economists are warning that the policy will cause more harm than good. Many said the tariffs are likely to make cars more expensive in the U.S. and drive up inflation at a time when consumer confidence is already shaky. Auto analysts from Wedbush Securities said the new rules could make some cars cost $5,000 to $10,000 more depending on the model and features. ‚ÄúIn our view these initial tariffs (if they hold in their current form) would be a hurricane-like headwind to foreign (and many U.S.) automakers and ultimately push the average price of cars up $5k to $10k depending on the make/model/price point,‚Äù the firm said in an emailed note Wednesday. They added that this may still be a negotiation tactic by Trump rather than a final decision. ‚ÄúWe continue to believe this is some form of negotiation, and these tariffs could change by the week, although this initial 25% tariff on autos from outside the U.S. is almost an untenable head-scratching number for the U.S. consumer,‚Äù they said. title: Hopeful Surge: Asia FX Climbs as US Dollar Weakens Post-Trump Tariffs
body: The Forex market is a dynamic beast, constantly reacting to global events. Recently, we‚Äôve seen a fascinating shift in Asia, where Asian currencies are showing resilience against the mighty US dollar. What‚Äôs fueling this change? The ripples from former US President Trump‚Äôs auto tariffs are still being felt, leading to a softening of the dollar and a subsequent uplift for Asia FX . Why is Asia FX Ticking Up? Decoding the Dollar‚Äôs Dip To understand why Asia FX is experiencing this positive momentum, we need to dissect the factors weakening the US Dollar . The story begins with trade policies, specifically the auto tariffs imposed during the Trump administration. While the intended goal might have been to bolster domestic industries, the unintended consequence is now playing out in the Forex market. Trade Tensions and Dollar Weakness: Tariffs, especially on major industries like automobiles, can create uncertainty in international trade. This uncertainty can sometimes lead to investors seeking alternatives to the US Dollar, perceived as potentially vulnerable to trade disputes. Economic Repercussions: While tariffs are designed to protect domestic industries, they can also increase costs for businesses and consumers. If these economic repercussions are perceived as negative for the US economy, it can dampen investor appetite for the US Dollar . Market Sentiment Shift: The Forex market is heavily influenced by sentiment. If traders and investors believe the US Dollar‚Äôs strength is waning due to policy decisions or economic indicators, they may start to move away from it, leading to a decrease in its value. Essentially, the lingering effects of trade policies, combined with evolving global economic perceptions, are contributing to the current easing of the US Dollar , creating a window of opportunity for Asia FX to strengthen. Which Asian Currencies are Benefiting? A Closer Look at Asia FX Performance The rise in Asia FX isn‚Äôt a uniform wave; some currencies are riding this tide more strongly than others. Let‚Äôs examine which Asian currencies are showing the most significant gains against the backdrop of a softer US Dollar : The Chinese Yuan (CNY): As a major player in the Asian economy, the Yuan‚Äôs movement is closely watched. A weaker US Dollar often provides breathing room for the Yuan, allowing it to appreciate slightly. This is particularly relevant given the ongoing trade dynamics between the US and China. The Japanese Yen (JPY): Often considered a safe-haven currency, the Yen can react in complex ways to global economic shifts. However, in this scenario, a softer US Dollar can reduce pressure on the Yen, potentially leading to some appreciation. The South Korean Won (KRW): The South Korean economy is heavily export-oriented, and the Won‚Äôs value is sensitive to global trade conditions. A weaker US Dollar can make South Korean exports more competitive, potentially bolstering the Won. Emerging Asian Currencies: Currencies like the Indian Rupee (INR), Indonesian Rupiah (IDR), and Malaysian Ringgit (MYR) can also benefit. These emerging market currencies are often more volatile but can see upward movement when the US Dollar loses some of its shine. It‚Äôs important to note that the extent of gains varies for each currency based on their individual economic fundamentals and domestic policies. However, the overarching theme is that the easing US Dollar is providing a tailwind for a broad spectrum of Asia FX . Trump Tariffs and Forex: Understanding the Lingering Impact The term ‚Äú Trump tariffs ‚Äù evokes a specific period of global trade policy. But why are we still talking about them and their impact on the Forex market ? The reality is that trade policies have long-lasting effects. Here‚Äôs how Trump tariffs continue to influence the current Forex market landscape: Aspect Impact of Trump Tariffs on Forex Trade Relationships Tariffs strained relationships with key trading partners, creating lasting uncertainty about future trade flows. This uncertainty can weigh on the US Dollar . Supply Chains Tariffs disrupted global supply chains, forcing businesses to re-evaluate their sourcing and production strategies. This can lead to shifts in currency valuations as trade patterns adjust. Inflationary Pressures Tariffs can contribute to inflationary pressures by increasing the cost of imported goods. Inflation expectations can influence central bank policies and, consequently, currency values. Investor Sentiment The era of Trump tariffs fostered a sense of protectionism and trade friction. This legacy continues to shape investor sentiment regarding global trade and currency risk. While new administrations may bring policy changes, the economic architecture shaped by previous trade actions, like Trump tariffs , takes time to unwind. Their impact on the Forex market , particularly on the strength of the US Dollar and the performance of Asia FX , remains relevant. Navigating the Forex Market: Actionable Insights for Traders For those involved in the Forex market , understanding these dynamics is crucial. What actionable insights can we glean from the current situation where Asia FX is ticking up as the US Dollar eases? Monitor Asian Currency Trends: Keep a close eye on the performance of Asian currencies against the US Dollar . Look for sustained upward trends and identify which currencies are showing the strongest momentum. Assess Trade Policy Developments: Stay informed about any shifts in trade policies, both in the US and in Asia. Changes in tariffs or trade agreements can have a direct and often immediate impact on currency valuations. Analyze Economic Data: Pay attention to economic data releases from both the US and Asian economies. Indicators like GDP growth, inflation, and employment figures can provide clues about the relative strength of currencies. Consider Risk Management: Forex market trading involves risk. Use appropriate risk management strategies, such as setting stop-loss orders, to protect your capital. Diversification across different currency pairs can also be a prudent approach. Seek Expert Analysis: Consult with experienced Forex market analysts or financial advisors to gain deeper insights and informed perspectives on trading strategies. The current Forex market scenario presents both opportunities and challenges. By staying informed, analyzing trends, and employing sound risk management, traders can navigate these shifts effectively. The Future Outlook: Will Asia FX Continue its Ascent? Looking ahead, the question on everyone‚Äôs mind is: will Asia FX continue to strengthen against the US Dollar ? While predicting the future with certainty is impossible, we can consider some key factors that will likely shape the outlook: Global Economic Recovery: The pace of global economic recovery will play a significant role. If the global economy strengthens, particularly in Asia, it could provide further support for Asia FX . US Monetary Policy: The future direction of US monetary policy is crucial. If the Federal Reserve maintains a dovish stance, keeping interest rates low, it could continue to weigh on the US Dollar . Geopolitical Stability: Geopolitical events can always inject volatility into the Forex market . Stability in key regions and trade relationships will be conducive to a more predictable currency environment. Asian Economic Reforms: Ongoing economic reforms and structural changes within Asian economies can enhance their long-term growth prospects and currency strength. In conclusion, the recent uptick in Asia FX as the US Dollar eases is a multifaceted phenomenon rooted in the lingering effects of trade policies and evolving global economic dynamics. While the future trajectory will depend on a complex interplay of factors, understanding the underlying drivers of these currency movements is essential for anyone navigating the global Forex market . To learn more about the latest Forex market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping currency valuations and global liquidity.

title: Planetarium Labs Secures $3M in Funding for Immortal Rising 2 and Sells Out NFT Collection Ahead of Major TGE Launch
body: The post Planetarium Labs Secures $3M in Funding for Immortal Rising 2 and Sells Out NFT Collection Ahead of Major TGE Launch appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Immortal Rising 2 , the blockchain-powered RPG developed by Busy Beans Studio and backed by Planetarium Labs , successfully raised $3 million in funding from some of the most influential investors in the Web3 and blockchain gaming spaces. This is one of two major concurrent developments, with the other being the completion of a sold-out Immortal Statue NFT sale just days before Immortal Rising 2‚Äôs Token Generation Event (TGE) , which started on March 27. Planetarium Labs is a community-focused Web3 gaming company that creates highly moddable blockchain-powered gaming experiences that feature immersive gameplay in player-driven economies. It is at the forefront of the decentralized gaming revolution and is redefining what is possible within the Web3 gaming ecosystem. The latest $3 million raise was driven by participation from some of the best-known players and investment firms in the Web3 blockchain gaming space, including the Spartan Group, Immutable, MARBLEX, Comma3 Ventures, Sovrun, 32-Bit Ventures, Notch Ventures, Cristian Manea, Niels de Ruiter , and other prominent angel investors. With this fresh capital injection, Planetarium Labs and the development team will be able to continue expanding the Immortal Rising 2 ecosystem while simultaneously enhancing gameplay mechanics and strengthening community engagement. These activities will help further solidify the studio‚Äôs position as a leader in ‚Äì and the global face of ‚Äì next-generation blockchain gaming. A Vision for the Future of Web3 Gaming The backing from these key investors highlights the industry‚Äôs confidence in Immortal Rising 2‚Äôs Play-to-Airdrop (P2A) model, which merges true digital ownership with engaging gameplay. Robbie Ferguson, the Co-Founder and President of Immutable , emphasized the game‚Äôs unique positioning by stating that Immortal Rising 2, with almost nine million downloads, has already proven its product-market fit. He also said that the title sits at the intersection of three major trends: Asia‚Äôs booming gaming market, the dominance of mobile gaming, and the seamless integration of Web3 mechanics. With Immutable zkEVM‚Äôs scaling solutions and Immutable Play , which is Immutable‚Äôs distribution platform, investors say they are excited to help bring this game to an even larger global audience. Other investors echoed similar sentiments, recognizing Immortal Rising 2 as a pioneering force in blockchain gaming. Kelvin Koh, a Co-founder & Partner at the Spartan Group , said that he sees the project as a milestone in decentralized gaming. He said that Immortal Rising 2 is setting new standards by offering players true ownership and meaningful rewards. He also stated that Planetarium Labs is at the forefront of this shift, and gave the unwavering support of the Spartan Group to Planetarium Labs in order to continue driving innovation in the Web3 blockchain gaming space. Finally, Jin-pyo Hong, the CEO of MARBLEX , pointed to the growing connection between Web2 and Web3 gaming by saying that Immortal Rising 2 bridges traditional and blockchain gaming in a way that makes sense for both gamers and investors. He said that MARBLEX is excited to partner with Planetarium Labs in this journey and to fully support the future of Immortal Rising 2. Sold-Out NFT Sale Sets the Stage for TGE Alongside the successful funding round, Immortal Rising 2‚Äôs Immortal Statue NFT sale has sold out, underscoring strong demand from not just players but collectors as well. These exclusive NFTs grant premium in-game rewards, token airdrops, and elevated status within the Immortal Rising 2 ecosystem. The NFT sale follows the game‚Äôs Play-to-Airdrop (P2A) launchpool, where the community has already claimed over 9 million SoulBound Tokens (SBTs). SBTs are digital assets tied exclusively to players‚Äô achievements. Because SBTs unlock hidden rewards at the campaign‚Äôs conclusion, they add new layers of engagement with players. Token Generation Event (TGE) With both the funding and NFT sale secured, all eyes are now on Immortal Rising 2‚Äôs TGE that officially unlocks new opportunities for players and investors. This marks a crucial milestone in the game‚Äôs expanding economy and governance model, setting the foundation for a fully decentralized gaming future.For more details on the TGE and upcoming game developments, follow Immortal Rising 2 on X (Twitter) and Discord .

title: SUI Shoots Up by 9% Daily, BTC Recovers After Sub-$86K Drop (Market Watch)
body: Bitcoin‚Äôs price nosedived yesterday to just under $86,000, but the asset bounced off and has recovered more than a grand since then. Most altcoins are in the red on a daily scale, including XRP, SOL, and DOGE. PI have finally charted some minor gains. BTC Bounces It was precisely a week ago when BTC‚Äôs price shot up above $87,500 on the heels of the Fed‚Äôs latest meeting and Ripple‚Äôs lawsuit conclusion. However, the cryptocurrency couldn‚Äôt maintain its run and quickly slumped to $83,000. It bounced off and stood primarily around $84,000 during the weekend. It finally made a move on Sunday evening that continued on Monday. At the time, the largest digital asset spiked to $88,800 for the first time in just over two weeks. The predominantly bearish momentum took its toll on this rally, and BTC failed to continue upward. The rejection was particularly violent on Wednesday as bitcoin dropped beneath $86,000 after a price decline of almost three grand. Nevertheless, it defended that level and quickly rose back above it. Moreover, it now trades at around $87,500, which is over a grand and a half higher than yesterday‚Äôs low. Its market cap has slid to $1.735 trillion on CG, but its dominance over the alts has increased slightly to 58.6%. BTCUSD. Source: TradingView SUI Rises 9% Most altcoins charted some gains over the past few days but have turned red now. Ethereum is down by over 1.5% and is close to breaking below $2,000 once again. XRP has slipped beneath $2.4 after a nearly 4% daily drop. SOL, DOGE, and ADA have marked similar losses, while SHIB has plunged by 7%. In contrast, BNB and TRX are up by around 1-2%. TON and TUI have emerged as today‚Äôs top performers, having surged by 7% and 9%, respectively. As a result, the former trades close to $3.9, while the latter has neared $2.8. The total crypto market cap has lost over $35 billion since yesterday and is down to $2.965 trillion on CG. Cryptocurrency Market Overview. title: Argentine President Milei Faces Waning Trust Amid $4.6B Libra Scandal
body: Trust in Argentine President Javier Milei has sharply declined following his alleged involvement in the $4.6 billion Libra crypto scandal. According to a recent poll by Zuban C√≥rdoba, nearly 58% of Argentinians expressed distrust in Milei, marking a significant blow to his public image. The survey, conducted between March 12 and 14, polled 1,600 participants with a 95% confidence level. When asked, ‚ÄúHow much do you trust Milei today?‚Äù 57.6% of respondents disapproved of him, while only 36% maintained their support. The remaining 6.4% were unsure. This was the first time Zuban C√≥rdoba included this specific question in their poll, but broader metrics also indicate that Milei‚Äôs popularity is slipping. For instance, the president‚Äôs national management approval rating dropped from 47.3% in November to 41.6% in March. Zuban C√≥rdoba‚Äôs report noted that public dissatisfaction with Milei‚Äôs leadership is ‚Äúslowly but steadily‚Äù increasing as political scandals continue to surface. Mixed Polls Reveal Divided Sentiment Despite Zuban C√≥rdoba‚Äôs findings, not all surveys portray Milei‚Äôs approval in freefall. A separate poll by the University of San Andr√©s, conducted between March 11 and 20 with 1,020 respondents, found Milei‚Äôs approval rating at 45%. Meanwhile, data from Morning Consult, collected between February 27 and March 5‚Äîafter the Libra scandal emerged‚Äîshowed Milei still holding a 62.4% approval rating. However, the Libra controversy has clearly impacted his credibility. Following his controversial February 14 post on X, which many interpreted as an endorsement of the Libra token, the cryptocurrency briefly soared to a $4.6 billion market cap. It soon collapsed by nearly 94%, leaving many investors in the lurch. Though Milei denied promoting the token , claiming he merely ‚Äúspread the word‚Äù about it, he is now facing fraud lawsuits over the incident. LIBRA Scandal Looms Over Upcoming Election The Libra scandal adds further volatility to Argentina‚Äôs already polarized political landscape, with the next presidential election slated for October 26. Although opposition parties have called for Milei‚Äôs impeachment, their efforts have so far gained little traction. Despite the fallout, Milei‚Äôs La Libertad Avanza party remains the frontrunner for the upcoming election, with 36.7% of respondents supporting the libertarian party. The rival Uni√≥n por la Patria trails slightly behind at 32.5%. Nonetheless, public dissatisfaction with Milei‚Äôs economic policies continues to mount. Only 43% of Argentinians believe he has effectively controlled inflation, while 63% oppose his attempts to secure a new loan from the International Monetary Fund (IMF). The post Argentine President Milei Faces Waning Trust Amid $4.6B Libra Scandal appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .
tags: Finance and Business News|Javier Milei|Libra scandal

title: Market Bets on XRP ETF Approval Following Ripple Legal Resolution
body: Following the conclusion of Ripple's multi-year legal battle with the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), attention within the crypto industry is shifting to the potential approval of an XRP exchange-traded fund (ETF) and long-term price projections for the token. With the legal uncertainty largely resolved, analysts and firms like Bitwise are weighing the possibilities for XRP's future ‚Äî from a potential surge in value driven by institutional adoption and real-world asset tokenization, to more conservative or bearish scenarios if those opportunities fail to materialize. XRP ETF Optimism Surges as Ripple-SEC Legal Battle Ends, Community Bets on 2025 Approval The crypto community is abuzz with renewed optimism over the potential approval of an exchange-traded fund (ETF) for XRP, following the long-awaited conclusion of Ripple‚Äôs landmark legal battle with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). After more than three years of court proceedings, Ripple has finally emerged victorious, setting the stage for what many believe could be the next major milestone for the digital asset: the launch of an XRP ETF. On March 19, Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse announced on X that the SEC had officially dropped its appeal in the case against the company. The lawsuit, which began in December 2020, alleged that Ripple had conducted a $1.3 billion unregistered securities offering by selling XRP tokens. The case cast a long shadow over Ripple and XRP‚Äôs potential in the US financial markets, creating legal uncertainty that hindered institutional adoption. The conclusion of the lawsuit has reignited speculation around the regulatory path forward for XRP, particularly the possibility of an ETF backed by the token. Shortly after the case was dropped, Nate Geraci, president of advisory firm ETF Store, took to X to declare that an XRP ETF now appears inevitable. Geraci, a prominent voice in the ETF industry, also speculated that financial giants like BlackRock and Fidelity could be among the first asset managers to file for or manage an XRP ETF. These firms have already shown substantial interest in crypto-backed ETFs, most notably through their filings and involvement with spot Bitcoin and Ethereum ETF applications. If history repeats itself, XRP could be the next major crypto asset to gain ETF approval, potentially joining the ranks of Bitcoin and Ethereum in regulated investment products. The bullish sentiment around a potential XRP ETF is not limited to crypto insiders. On decentralized prediction market Polymarket , bettors are placing significant wagers on the approval of an XRP ETF by the end of 2025. As of March 26, Polymarket showed an 86% probability that the SEC will greenlight an XRP ETF before Dec. 31 of this year. However, when it comes to short-term expectations, the outlook is more reserved. Polymarket users only gave a 42% chance that the ETF would be approved before July 31, suggesting that while optimism is high for 2025, traders anticipate a slower regulatory process in the first half of the year. Despite being a gambling site, Polymarket has built a strong reputation for accurate forecasting. Data from a Dune Analytics dashboard indicates that Polymarket predictions have historically had over 90% accuracy a month prior to market resolution ‚Äî giving added weight to the platform‚Äôs current odds. Price Action Muted Despite Major Win Surprisingly, XRP‚Äôs price reaction to the legal victory was relatively muted. According to Nicolai Sondergaard, a research analyst at blockchain analytics firm Nansen, the modest price action was likely due to the legal resolution already being priced in by investors. This reaction echoes broader crypto market behavior, where even significant news can often be front-run by insider speculation or reflected early in price movements. With the regulatory cloud lifting, Ripple may now be able to pursue more aggressive expansion plans in the US and abroad. The company has long argued that XRP is not a security and has advocated for clearer digital asset regulations. The case‚Äôs conclusion may now serve as a precedent in future crypto-SEC disputes, especially regarding the classification of tokens. More immediately, attention will shift to whether Ripple or a third-party asset manager files for an XRP ETF. If Geraci‚Äôs forecast is correct and firms like BlackRock or Fidelity jump into the ring, XRP could soon have the legitimacy and market access that only regulated ETFs can provide. An ETF would offer traditional investors a seamless way to gain exposure to XRP without needing to hold or manage the token directly. This could open the floodgates to institutional capital and spark a new growth cycle for XRP ‚Äî especially if macro conditions and regulatory clarity continue to improve. Bitwise Predicts XRP Could Soar to $29 by 2030 in Best-Case Scenario, But Warns of Collapse to $0.13 if Adoption Fails In related news, Bitwise, a leading cryptocurrency index fund manager, has released a bold price forecast for XRP, estimating that the Ripple-affiliated token could reach an eye-watering $29.32 by the end of this decade. However, the firm also cautioned that XRP could just as easily plummet to $0.13 if the blockchain fails to secure traction in key target markets, including payments and real-world asset (RWA) tokenization. The wide-ranging forecast was based on the Capital Asset Pricing Model (CAPM), a traditional financial valuation framework adapted to assess cryptocurrency valuations in emerging sectors like blockchain infrastructure and tokenized finance. Bitwise‚Äôs most optimistic projection envisions XRP securing a ‚Äúmeaningful‚Äù share of the global payments and tokenization markets. Under this ‚Äúmax scenario,‚Äù XRP‚Äôs market cap would balloon to $2.9 trillion by 2030 ‚Äî surpassing even Microsoft‚Äôs current valuation of $2.89 trillion and making XRP one of the most valuable digital assets in history. This level of growth would require XRP to become a critical backbone for institutional-grade payments and tokenized financial instruments, potentially powering transactions across banks, central banks, fintechs, and decentralized finance ecosystems alike. In such a scenario, XRP would be priced at $29.32 ‚Äî a staggering leap from its current valuation hovering below $3. Bitwise believes this outcome, while ambitious, could materialize if Ripple succeeds in expanding XRPL (XRP Ledger) adoption among major financial institutions and if tokenization becomes a core pillar of the next generation financial infrastructure. While the ‚Äúmax scenario‚Äù projects a massive price explosion, Bitwise‚Äôs ‚Äúbull scenario‚Äù offers a more conservative yet still bullish outcome. In this case, XRP could reach $12.70 by 2030. This forecast assumes continued growth of the XRP network with steady user adoption and infrastructure improvements ‚Äî but without XRP gaining dominant market share in either payments or tokenization. In other words, XRP would still thrive as a utility token with real use cases, but not become the central player in cross-border transactions or the asset tokenization boom. This scenario also requires minimal regulatory or technical setbacks, especially in maintaining the XRPL‚Äôs speed, cost-efficiency, and decentralization. On the opposite end of the spectrum, Bitwise‚Äôs bear scenario paints a grim picture: if XRP fails to penetrate the payments or tokenization industries and institutional enthusiasm for the XRPL dwindles, the token‚Äôs price could collapse to as low as $0.13 by the end of the decade. Bitwise‚Äôs outlook factors in the potential XRP ETF, which could act as a powerful catalyst for price appreciation. The firm itself filed for an XRP ETF in October and has since maintained that regulatory approval is only a matter of time. Nate Geraci, president of the ETF Store and a vocal advocate for crypto ETFs, recently said that firms like BlackRock and Fidelity are likely to enter the XRP ETF race as well. This would follow their participation in the spot Bitcoin ETF market, which gained traction after the SEC approved several applications in early 2024. With the legal uncertainties largely resolved and increasing attention from major financial players, the stage could be set for a regulatory green light that ushers XRP into the ETF spotlight ‚Äî a move that could significantly increase its exposure to institutional and retail investors. Tokenization: The Multi-Trillion-Dollar Opportunity Bitwise‚Äôs projections are grounded in the idea that tokenization ‚Äî the conversion of real-world assets like stocks, bonds, real estate, and commodities into blockchain-based digital tokens ‚Äî will be a multi-trillion-dollar industry by 2030. Should XRP and the XRP Ledger become one of the key infrastructures for this tokenized financial future, the upside potential is massive. Ripple‚Äôs long-standing relationships with banks and payment providers, coupled with XRPL‚Äôs reputation for speed and low transaction fees, position it well in this emerging sector. However, competition is fierce. Ethereum, Solana, and newer tokenization-focused chains are all vying for dominance. Whether XRP can carve out a sizable niche remains to be seen.

title: Copper Partners with Everstake to Deliver Secure Staking Services for Institutional Investors
body: London, United Kingdom, March 27th, 2025, Chainwire Copper , a leader in digital asset custody, collateral management, and prime services, is pleased to announce a strategic partnership with Everstake , a leading global non-custodial staking and blockchain solutions provider, to offer institutional investors secure, enterprise-grade staking services with top-tier asset protection. For institutional token holders, choosing reliable staking validators and maintaining network decentralization are critical concerns‚Äî78.4% of institutional investors cite centralization risk as a key issue. Through this partnership, Copper and Everstake address these challenges by combining Everstake's decentralized infrastructure and 99% uptime with Copper‚Äôs industry-leading security and settlement capabilities. Institutional clients can now securely stake ETH, SOL, ADA, NEAR, and ATOM directly on the Copper platform. Integrating Everstake's extensive staking network with Copper's industry-leading MPC technology and settlement infrastructure ensures seamless access to staking rewards* while enhancing security and network decentralization for PoS (Proof-of-Stake) ecosystems. "We are excited to join forces with Everstake to continue to provide clients with unparalleled security and efficiency by facilitating staking services," said Ben Lorente, Strategic Alliances Director at Copper. "This partnership underscores our commitment to fostering a secure and robust digital asset environment." "We're proud to partner with Copper to provide institutional investors with secure and reliable staking services," said Bohdan Opryshko, co-founder and COO of Everstake. "At Everstake, we understand the unique needs of institutional clients, and our extensive expertise in serving them‚Äîcombined with Copper's exceptional asset custody solutions‚Äîallows us to create a secure, regulatory compliant, and user-friendly staking environment. Together, we're setting a new standard for innovation and adding real value for our clients." *Staking is not available in the United Kingdom through Copper. About Copper Since being founded in 2018, Copper.co (‚ÄúCopper‚Äù) has been building the standard for institutional digital asset infrastructure with a focus on custody and collateral management. Underpinned by multi-award-winning technology, Copper has built a comprehensive and secure suite of products and services required to safely custody and trade digital assets. At the core of Copper‚Äôs infrastructure is ClearLoop , which enables clients to manage collateral and settle trades across multiple exchanges, while mitigating counterparty risk and increasing capital efficiency. About Everstake Everstake , founded in 2018 by blockchain engineers, is a leading global provider of staking and blockchain solutions. Operating across 80+ networks with over 735,000 delegators, Everstake ensures high uptime through its robust global infrastructure and expert team. Beyond staking, the company builds L1 infrastructure for networks like Ethereum and Solana and supports the growth of projects such as Wormhole. Everstake is also committed to blockchain education, empowering users with valuable insights into Proof-of-Stake and Web3 technologies. Everstake is a software platform that provides infrastructure tools and resources for users but does not offer investment advice or investment opportunities, manage funds, facilitate collective investment schemes, provide financial services or take custody of, or otherwise hold or manage, customer assets. Everstake does not conduct any independent diligence on or substantive review of any blockchain asset, digital currency, cryptocurrency or associated funds. Everstake‚Äôs provision of technology services allowing a user to stake digital assets is not an endorsement or a recommendation of any digital assets by it. Users are fully and solely responsible for evaluating whether to stake digital assets. ContactPR ManagerAnnabella LapshynaEverstakemarketing@everstake.one Disclaimer: This is a sponsored press release and is for informational purposes only. It does not reflect the views of Crypto Daily, nor is it intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, or financial advice.

title: Landmark Roadmap Revealed: Digital Chamber Unveils U.S. Blockchain Strategy for Crypto Dominance
body: Hold onto your hats, crypto enthusiasts! The digital frontier just got a whole lot clearer. The Digital Chamber (TDC), a prominent U.S. cryptocurrency lobbying group, has dropped a bombshell ‚Äì the U.S. Blockchain Roadmap . This isn‚Äôt just another whitepaper; it‚Äôs a comprehensive strategy outlining six pivotal policy recommendations designed to shape the future of digital assets and blockchain technology in the United States. For anyone navigating the complex world of crypto, this roadmap is essential reading. Let‚Äôs dive into the key takeaways and explore what this means for the future of crypto in the USA. Decoding the U.S. Blockchain Roadmap: 6 Pillars for Crypto‚Äôs Future The Digital Chamber‚Äôs roadmap isn‚Äôt just a wish list; it‚Äôs a structured plan to integrate blockchain technology and digital assets into the very fabric of the U.S. economy and governance. Let‚Äôs break down the six core policy recommendations: Strengthening Financial Stability Through Digital Assets: How can digital currencies contribute to a more robust financial system? Protecting Financial Freedom and Decentralization: Why is decentralization crucial, and how can policy safeguard financial autonomy in the digital age? Leading Global Capital Markets with Regulatory Clarity: What kind of regulations are needed to position the U.S. as a leader in the global digital economy? Advancing Energy Security Through Bitcoin Mining: Can Bitcoin mining be leveraged to enhance energy independence and grid stability? Modernizing the U.S. Banking System: How can blockchain technology revolutionize traditional banking and financial services? Exploring Blockchain Applications for Government Innovation and National Security: Where can blockchain drive efficiency and security in government operations and national defense? These aren‚Äôt just abstract concepts; they are actionable areas where policy changes can unlock significant potential. Let‚Äôs delve deeper into each pillar. Navigating Cryptocurrency Regulation: Charting a Course for Clarity One of the most pressing issues in the crypto space is the lack of clear cryptocurrency regulation. The Digital Chamber‚Äôs roadmap directly addresses this, emphasizing the need for regulatory clarity to lead global capital markets . But what does this actually mean? Clear Guidelines: Businesses and innovators need well-defined rules to operate confidently within the U.S. market. Ambiguity stifles innovation and drives talent overseas. Investor Protection: Robust regulations are crucial to protect investors from scams and market manipulation, fostering trust in the digital asset ecosystem. Global Competitiveness: Proactive and sensible regulation can position the U.S. as a hub for crypto innovation, attracting investment and talent. The roadmap advocates for a balanced approach ‚Äì one that encourages innovation while mitigating risks. This includes: Passing Stablecoin Legislation: Providing a clear legal framework for stablecoins, which are vital for everyday crypto transactions. Enacting Bitcoin Legislation: Establishing a legal status for Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies to encourage adoption and innovation. Imagine a future where crypto businesses can operate with the same legal certainty as traditional financial institutions. This roadmap aims to pave the way for that reality. Unlocking the Potential of Digital Assets: Beyond Cryptocurrency The roadmap‚Äôs scope extends beyond just cryptocurrencies to encompass the broader realm of digital assets. This is a crucial distinction. Digital assets include everything from NFTs and security tokens to central bank digital currencies (CBDCs). The Digital Chamber recognizes the transformative potential of these assets to: Modernize the U.S. Banking System: Blockchain technology can streamline payments, reduce transaction costs, and enhance the efficiency of financial operations. Strengthen Financial Stability: Digital assets can diversify investment portfolios and potentially offer hedges against traditional market volatility. Protect Financial Freedom and Decentralization: Digital assets offer individuals greater control over their finances and can reduce reliance on intermediaries. However, realizing these benefits requires careful consideration of policy. The roadmap emphasizes the importance of: Reforming the Federal Reserve‚Äôs Master Account Process: Ensuring fair access to the Federal Reserve system for crypto-focused financial institutions, fostering competition and innovation. Exploring Blockchain Applications for Government Innovation and National Security: Investigating how blockchain can enhance government efficiency, transparency, and security across various sectors, from supply chain management to digital identity. Think about government services becoming more efficient and transparent through blockchain. This roadmap envisions a future where blockchain is not just about finance, but about transforming how government and society function. Bitcoin Mining and US Policy: Powering the Future Responsibly The inclusion of Bitcoin mining in the roadmap might raise eyebrows for some, but it‚Äôs a strategic move. The Digital Chamber highlights the potential of advancing energy security through Bitcoin mining . How? By: Utilizing Excess Energy: Bitcoin mining can absorb excess energy from renewable sources or during off-peak hours, improving grid efficiency and reducing energy waste. Supporting Energy Infrastructure: Mining operations can incentivize investment in energy infrastructure, particularly in remote or underutilized areas. Promoting Innovation in Energy Consumption: The energy demands of Bitcoin mining are driving innovation in energy-efficient mining technologies and sustainable energy solutions. However, it‚Äôs crucial to address environmental concerns. The roadmap likely implies a focus on responsible mining practices and the use of renewable energy sources. This is about harnessing the potential of Bitcoin mining in a way that aligns with broader energy and sustainability goals. The conversation needs to shift towards sustainable Bitcoin mining, and policy can play a crucial role in incentivizing green practices. US Policy in the Digital Age: A Roadmap for Action Ultimately, the U.S. Blockchain Roadmap is a call to action. It‚Äôs a framework for policymakers to engage with the rapidly evolving world of blockchain and digital assets. The roadmap isn‚Äôt just about reacting to trends; it‚Äôs about proactively shaping the future. It emphasizes the need for US policy to be forward-thinking and adaptable to the unique challenges and opportunities presented by this technology. The key takeaways are: Proactive Engagement: Policymakers need to actively engage with the crypto industry and understand the nuances of blockchain technology. Balanced Regulation: Regulations should be carefully crafted to foster innovation while protecting consumers and maintaining financial stability. Strategic Vision: The U.S. needs a clear, long-term vision for its role in the global digital economy, and blockchain technology must be a central part of that vision. This roadmap is a significant step towards establishing the United States as a leader in the blockchain and digital asset space. It‚Äôs a framework for informed discussions, collaborative policymaking, and ultimately, a more prosperous and innovative future powered by blockchain technology. The Road Ahead: What‚Äôs Next for the Blockchain Revolution? The Digital Chamber‚Äôs U.S. Blockchain Roadmap is more than just a document; it‚Äôs a starting point. It sets the stage for crucial conversations and actions needed to integrate blockchain and digital assets into the U.S. economy. The success of this roadmap hinges on collaboration ‚Äì between industry leaders, policymakers, and the public. It requires open dialogue, a willingness to learn, and a commitment to building a regulatory environment that fosters innovation and protects consumers. This roadmap offers a hopeful vision for the future of crypto in the US, a future where innovation thrives within a clear and supportive regulatory framework. title: Japan PM says Japan will put all options on the table to deal with Trump‚Äôs tariffs
body: Japan‚Äôs Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba revealed on Thursday that the country will consider ‚Äúall options on the table‚Äù in dealing with Washington‚Äôs import tariffs. The Trump administration issued Tokyo 25% duties on car imports to the U.S. Ishiba argued that Tokyo was the largest investor in the U.S., and it made no sense to impose tariffs on all states. He also urged parliament that the country needs to consider what‚Äôs best for Japan‚Äôs national interest. Tokyo plans to put ‚Äòall options on the table‚Äô in response to U.S. tariffs Japan's Prime Minister says "all options" are on the table after US President Trump announced 25% tariffs on all auto imports, targeting the world's biggest suppliers including key Asian allies Japan and South Korea. The latest. https://t.co/09KRJXHjIB pic.twitter.com/O973YYqNWP ‚Äî Kristie Lu Stout‚úåüèΩ (@klustout) March 27, 2025 Japan‚Äôs Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba acknowledged that Tokyo was ready to put ‚Äúall options on the table‚Äù in tackling the Trump administration‚Äôs heightened trade policies. U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday imposed a 25% tariff on imported cars and light trucks from Japan to the U.S. starting next week. ‚ÄúJapan is a country that is making the largest amount of investment to the United States, so we wonder if it makes sense for (Washington) to apply uniform tariffs to all countries. That is a point we‚Äôve been making and will continue to do so.‚Äù ‚Äì Shigeru Ishiba, the Prime Minister of Japan The President of the Liberal Democratic Party (LDP) revealed that the country was ‚Äúputting all options on the table‚Äù in considering the most effective response. He did not specify the possible steps Tokyo may take in combating Washington‚Äôs trade policies. Data from the Ministry of Finance revealed that automobiles made up 28.3% of Japan‚Äôs total exports to the United States in 2024, the biggest ratio among all items. The data also showed that the auto industry makes up around 3% of Japan‚Äôs gross domestic product (GDP). Tokyo‚Äôs auto industry has been the driver of recent wage hikes in the country, as automakers distribute the huge profits they reaped overseas to their employees. Executive economist at Nomura Research Institute (NRI) Takahide Kiuchi believes that a 25% increase in U.S. auto tariffs will push down Japan‚Äôs GDP by roughly 0.2%. Kiuchi maintained that ‚Äúthe Trump tariff has the potential to immediately push Japan‚Äôs economy into deterioration. Toyota Motor Corp., the world‚Äôs largest carmaker by delivery, plummeted by 4% in Tokyo, while Honda Motor Co. sank as much as 3%. Nissan Motor Co. lost about 3.5%, while Mazda Motor Corp retreated by more than 5% after Trump‚Äôs tariff announcement. Automakers also performed the worst on the Topix Transportation Equipment index since automobiles and auto parts account for more than a third of Japan‚Äôs export products. The tariffs on automakers might lead to higher car prices for U.S. consumers, about half of whose purchases come from abroad. President and CEO of Autos Drive America Jennifer Safavian argued that ‚ÄúThe tariffs imposed today will make it more expensive to produce and sell cars in the United States, ultimately leading to higher prices, fewer options for consumers, and fewer manufacturing jobs in the U.S. Trump ramps up trade war with 25% tariffs on automobiles *TRUMP ANNOUNCES 25% AUTO TARIFFS ON ALL CARS NOT MADE IN US Look on the bright side. If your Toyota Camry costs 25% more, maybe Japan will finally be incentivized to secure our southern border. ‚Äî Spencer Hakimian (@SpencerHakimian) March 26, 2025 United States President Donald Trump imposed a 25 per cent tariff on imported cars and car parts. He said at the Oval Office on Wednesday that tariffs would ‚Äútake back‚Äù money from foreign countries that have been ‚Äútaking our jobs‚Äù and ‚Äútaking our health.‚Äù The President pledged to revive manufacturing in the U.S. and argued that tariffs would ‚Äúspur growth like you haven‚Äôt seen before.‚Äù Trump also mentioned in a fact sheet that the tariffs set to take effect on April 2 would ‚Äúprotect and strengthen‚Äù the U.S. auto industry. He also argued that the industry had been undermined by excessive imports that threatened America‚Äôs domestic industrial base and supply chains. Trump highlighted that foreign automobile industries, bolstered by unfair subsidies and aggressive industrial policies, had expanded while U.S. production remained stagnant. He also suggested that importers bringing in vehicles and parts under the United States-Mexico-Canada Agreement would have the chance to certify what portion of their products are U.S.-made so that they only pay the tariff on ‚Äúnon-U.S. content.‚Äù President of the European Union Ursula von der Leyen said , ‚ÄúTariffs are taxes ‚Äì bad for business, worse for consumers, in the U.S. and the EU.‚Äù Leyen also maintained that the EU will continue to seek negotiated solutions while safeguarding its economic interests. title: Copper Partners with Everstake to Deliver Secure Staking Services for Institutional Investors
body: March 27th, 2025 ‚Äì London, United Kingdom Copper , a leader in digital asset custody, collateral management, and prime services, is pleased to announce a strategic partnership with Everstake , a leading global non-custodial staking and blockchain solutions provider, to offer institutional investors secure, enterprise-grade staking services with top-tier asset protection. For institutional token holders, choosing reliable staking validators and maintaining network decentralization are critical concerns‚Äî78.4% of institutional investors cite centralization risk as a key issue. Through this partnership, Copper and Everstake address these challenges by combining Everstake‚Äôs decentralized infrastructure and 99% uptime with Copper‚Äôs industry-leading security and settlement capabilities. Institutional clients can now securely stake ETH, SOL, ADA, NEAR, and ATOM directly on the Copper platform. Integrating Everstake‚Äôs extensive staking network with Copper‚Äôs industry-leading MPC technology and settlement infrastructure ensures seamless access to staking rewards* while enhancing security and network decentralization for PoS (Proof-of-Stake) ecosystems. ‚ÄúWe are excited to join forces with Everstake to continue to provide clients with unparalleled security and efficiency by facilitating staking services,‚Äù said Ben Lorente, Strategic Alliances Director at Copper. ‚ÄúThis partnership underscores our commitment to fostering a secure and robust digital asset environment.‚Äù ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre proud to partner with Copper to provide institutional investors with secure and reliable staking services,‚Äù said Bohdan Opryshko, co-founder and COO of Everstake. ‚ÄúAt Everstake, we understand the unique needs of institutional clients, and our extensive expertise in serving them‚Äîcombined with Copper‚Äôs exceptional asset custody solutions‚Äîallows us to create a secure, regulatory compliant, and user-friendly staking environment. Together, we‚Äôre setting a new standard for innovation and adding real value for our clients.‚Äù *Staking is not available in the United Kingdom through Copper. About Copper Since being founded in 2018, Copper.co (‚ÄúCopper‚Äù) has been building the standard for institutional digital asset infrastructure with a focus on custody and collateral management. Underpinned by multi-award-winning technology, Copper has built a comprehensive and secure suite of products and services required to safely custody and trade digital assets. At the core of Copper‚Äôs infrastructure is ClearLoop , which enables clients to manage collateral and settle trades across multiple exchanges, while mitigating counterparty risk and increasing capital efficiency. About Everstake Everstake , founded in 2018 by blockchain engineers, is a leading global provider of staking and blockchain solutions. Operating across 80+ networks with over 735,000 delegators, Everstake ensures high uptime through its robust global infrastructure and expert team. Beyond staking, the company builds L1 infrastructure for networks like Ethereum and Solana and supports the growth of projects such as Wormhole. Everstake is also committed to blockchain education, empowering users with valuable insights into Proof-of-Stake and Web3 technologies. Everstake is a software platform that provides infrastructure tools and resources for users but does not offer investment advice or investment opportunities, manage funds, facilitate collective investment schemes, provide financial services or take custody of, or otherwise hold or manage, customer assets. Everstake does not conduct any independent diligence on or substantive review of any blockchain asset, digital currency, cryptocurrency or associated funds. Everstake‚Äôs provision of technology services allowing a user to stake digital assets is not an endorsement or a recommendation of any digital assets by it. Users are fully and solely responsible for evaluating whether to stake digital assets. Contact PR Manager Annabella Lapshyna Everstake marketing@everstake.one This content is sponsored and should be regarded as promotional material. Opinions and statements expressed herein are those of the author and do not reflect the opinions of The Daily Hodl. The Daily Hodl is not a subsidiary of or owned by any ICOs, blockchain startups or companies that advertise on our platform. Investors should do their due diligence before making any high-risk investments in any ICOs, blockchain startups or cryptocurrencies. Please be advised that your investments are at your own risk, and any losses you may incur are your responsibility.
