title: Binance and OKX list JELLY futures amid Hyperliquid‚Äôs delisting and market manipulation fallout
body: Following 400%+ price pump of JELLY caused by a market manipulation incident on Hyperliquid, Binance and OKX capitalized on the volatility by listing JELLY futures, while Hyperliquid delisted the token‚Äôs perps, facing backlash over centralization concerns. After the recent market manipulation incident on Hyperliquid ( HYPE ) involving the Jelly Jelly (JELLY) token, the derivatives exchange decided to delist JELLY and reimburse affected users. Shortly after, Binance listed JELLY futures, followed by OKX . This was likely a move to seize the opportunity created by the token‚Äôs extreme price swing, which made it highly attractive for speculative trading. On March 26, the price of JELLY spiked from around $0.0095, where the exploiter opened his short position, to a high of $.0.050, marking approximately 426% increase. Given that high volatility drives trading volume, both exchanges stand to profit considerably from trading fees on JELLY perps. Source: Arkham Intelligence‚Äôs X However, some believe Binance and OKX‚Äôs move isn‚Äôt just about potential profit from fees, but also about wiping the competitor. One user even called it a ‚Äúpure move to try and bury a competitor,‚Äù comparing it to Binance‚Äôs alleged role in FTX‚Äôs collapse, adding it ‚Äúrewrites the history of what happened to FTX.‚Äù Interestingly, blockchain investigator ZachXBT pointed out that the two accounts linked to the manipulation 0x20e8 and 0x67f were funded via Binance. Source: @zachxbt Meanwhile, the price of JELLY has retraced to $0.020, according to CoinGecko . You might also like: Hyperliquid removes JELLY amid market manipulation accusations, promises refunds The manipulation incident According to Arkham Intelligence , the trader in question opened three accounts: two holding long positions worth $2.15 million and $1.9 million, and a third with a $4.1 million short position, effectively balancing out the longs. The total amounted to $7.17M. Hyperliquid just got exploited. What happened? A trader deposited $7.167M on 3 separate Hyperliquid accounts within 5 minutes of each other. He then made leveraged trades on an illiquid coin, JELLYJELLY. However, he ended up losing money, and is down almost $1M unless‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/uNyMwLS5Sc ‚Äî Arkham (@arkham) March 26, 2025 Then, the trader aggressively bought JELLY on decentralized exchanges. Since liquidity on DEXes is low, their buying activity quickly drove JELLY price up. After the token‚Äôs price increased by over 400%, the $4.1 million short position was supposed to be liquidated. However, the liquidation was too large to be executed immediately, so it was transferred to HyperLiquid‚Äôs automated market-making vault , the Hyperliquidity Provider. At the same time, the trader quickly withdrew funds from their other two accounts with unrealized profit from the JELLY 400%+ price increase as a result of their DEX buying activity. According to Arkham, the trader managed to withdraw $6.26 million, with ~$900K still remaining in the accounts. At this point, HyperLiquid caught on to what was happening and restricted the trader‚Äôs accounts to reduce-only mode, freezing their ability to withdraw funds. With withdrawals blocked, the trader then started selling JELLY on the market. This selling helped them recover some of the funds, but it didn‚Äôt fully salvage their position because HyperLiquid then closed the market at $0.0095, the same price at which they opened their short trade. As a result, all floating PnL on the first two accounts were wiped. According to Abhi, founder of Web3 company AP Collective, said that if Hyperliquid didn‚Äôt close the position, it would‚Äôve faced full liquidation if JELLY reached $150M market cap. After the incident, Hyperliquid‚Äôs decided to delist JELLY perpetuals. The decision was made by a consensus between Hyperliquid‚Äôs validators, sparking outrage from crypto community due to centralization concerns. Arthur Hayer said that HyperLiquid clearly wasn‚Äôt able to handle the situation with JELLY and that it‚Äôs time to stop pretending that HyperLiquid is a decentralized platform. $HYPE can‚Äôt handle the $JELLY Let‚Äôs stop pretending hyperliquid is decentralised And then stop pretending traders actually give a fuck Bet you $HYPE is back where is started in short order cause degens gonna degen ‚Äî Arthur Hayes (@CryptoHayes) March 26, 2025 Echoing his sentiment, Bitget CEO Gracy Chen commented : ‚ÄúThe decision to close the $JELLY market and force settlement of positions at a favorable price sets a dangerous precedent,‚Äù Chen said. ‚ÄúTrust‚Äînot capital‚Äîis the foundation of any exchange and once lost, it‚Äôs almost impossible to recover.‚Äù You might also like: Bitget CEO says Hyperliquid could become FTX 2.0 amid JELLY incident

title: Pi Network News: Has Binance Officially Rejected Pi Coin Listing?
body: The post Pi Network News: Has Binance Officially Rejected Pi Coin Listing? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News There have been reports suggesting that Binance, one of the largest cryptocurrency exchanges in the world, has rejected listing Pi Coin. However, an official statement from Binance is still missing, so the situation remains unclear. The Reports and the Confusion Reports say that Binance has explained its decision not to list Pi Coin due to several reasons. These include Pi Network still being too centralized and not having an open mainnet. Binance has stated that Pi Coin can only be listed once these issues are fixed, with decentralization and an open mainnet being key to the process. Pi Coin fans and investors have quickly reacted on social media, saying that the reports are false. Many believe that Binance‚Äôs claims about the mainnet being closed are incorrect. ‚ÄúThe mainnet is open! It launched on February 20,‚Äù one Pi Coin supporter pointed out.‚Äù Some people argue that because Binance hasn‚Äôt officially confirmed anything, this news may just be a rumor. ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs no official statement from Binance saying they rejected Pi Coin, so that shows there might not be any truth to the reports,‚Äù one person said. What‚Äôs Going on with Pi Network? Pi Network officially launched its open mainnet on February 20, 2025, promising better decentralization and infrastructure. The Pi Network community has been working hard to grow and improve its platform, but there are still challenges ahead, such as getting more recognition and liquidity. Without an official statement from Binance, no one knows for sure whether Pi Coin will be listed. Some are hopeful that Binance will eventually recognize Pi Coin‚Äôs progress, while others remain skeptical. If Binance really has rejected Pi Coin, it could be a big setback for the project. On the other hand, if Binance is just waiting for more progress, Pi Coin‚Äôs supporters might still have hope. At press time, Pi coin has gained more than 3% and is trading at $0.84.

title: Tether user base hits 400m, up 14% since October 2024
body: With Tether now used by ‚Äî conservatively ‚Äî over 400 million people, Paolo Ardoino calls it part of a stablecoin multiverse that is only getting started. Tether‚Äôs ( USDT ) user base has exceeded 400 million, growing by 50 million since October 2024, CEO Paolo Ardoino announced in a March 27 post on X , predicting it could reach 1 billion soon. A new era begins : the stablecoin multiverse. Hundreds of companies and governments are launching (or will soon) their stablecoins. I'm very proud to see such massive adoption of a technology that Tether created back in 2014 üôè Good luck everyone ‚ô•Ô∏è ‚Äî Paolo Ardoino ü§ñ (@paoloardoino) March 27, 2025 Tether, the largest stablecoin issuer with USDT‚Äôs market capitalization exceeding $144.1 billion, continues expanding across emerging markets and multiple blockchains, what Ardoino described as part of a broader trend, calling it ‚Äúthe stablecoin multiverse‚Äù and noting that ‚Äúhundreds of companies and governments are launching (or will soon) their stablecoins.‚Äù The Tether CEO attributed the company‚Äôs growth to its focus on grassroots adoption, suggesting the company has taken a different approach from traditional financial institutions. ‚ÄúWe always focused on the adoption from the ground up, working in the streets, among other people, while traditional finance was watching at us from their ivory towers.‚Äù Paolo Ardoino You might also like: Wyoming to launch first state-issued stablecoin on LayerZero by July Ardoino didn‚Äôt provide details on how Tether calculated its user estimates or how soon the company expects to reach the 1 billion mark. However, the stablecoin issuer has seen its expansion growing rapidly, particularly across networks like TRON, Ethereum, and other chains. In October 2024, Tether reported 350 million users, suggesting that the latest figure represents an approximate 14% increase in less than six months. Still, competition in the stablecoin market is heating up, with Tether‚Äôs main rival Circle continuing to strengthen its presence in Asia. Meanwhile, Tether is focusing on diversifying its investment portfolio. As crypto.news reported earlier, the stablecoin issuer is preparing to acquire a 30% stake in Be Water, a broadcast media company based in Rome, Italy. title: Revolutionary Bitcoin Yield: Avalon Labs Integrates BlackRock BUIDL for Enhanced sUSDa Returns
body: Exciting news for Bitcoin holders seeking amplified returns! Imagine earning yields not just from the potential price appreciation of Bitcoin, but also from traditional financial instruments like U.S. Treasuries. Avalon Labs, the innovative force behind the BTC-backed stablecoin USDa, is making this a reality by supporting BlackRock‚Äôs USD Institutional Digital Liquidity Fund (BUIDL). This strategic move promises to redefine how you can grow your Bitcoin holdings. Let‚Äôs dive into how this integration is set to create a revolutionary Bitcoin yield opportunity. Unlocking Enhanced Bitcoin Yield with Real World Assets (RWA) Avalon Labs has officially announced its support for BlackRock‚Äôs BUIDL fund via the Securitize platform. This isn‚Äôt just another partnership; it‚Äôs a significant leap towards bridging the gap between traditional finance and the burgeoning world of digital assets. By integrating with BUIDL, Avalon Labs is injecting real-world asset (RWA) yields into its yield-bearing Bitcoin stablecoin, sUSDa. But what does this actually mean for you, the Bitcoin enthusiast? Essentially, holding sUSDa now becomes even more lucrative. It‚Äôs no longer just about the inherent potential of Bitcoin; it‚Äôs about earning a dual yield. Let‚Äôs break down the magic: BTC On-Chain Yield: sUSDa, being Bitcoin-backed, inherently participates in the on-chain yield opportunities within the Bitcoin ecosystem. RWA Yield from U.S. Treasuries: Through the integration with BlackRock‚Äôs BUIDL, sUSDa holders gain exposure to the yields generated from U.S. Treasury bills, brought into the digital realm. This combination creates a powerful ‚Äúdual-yield engine,‚Äù offering a compounded return that traditional Bitcoin holding simply can‚Äôt match. For those looking to maximize their Bitcoin‚Äôs earning potential, this is a game-changer. Why is RWA Tokenization and BUIDL a Big Deal? The concept of Real World Asset (RWA) tokenization is gaining massive traction, and for good reason. It‚Äôs about bringing tangible assets from the traditional financial system onto the blockchain, unlocking new levels of efficiency, accessibility, and yield generation. BlackRock‚Äôs BUIDL fund is a prime example of this in action. Consider these benefits of RWA tokenization and BUIDL: Access to Institutional Grade Yields: BUIDL provides access to yields from high-quality assets like U.S. Treasury bills, typically reserved for institutional investors. Now, through sUSDa, even individual Bitcoin holders can tap into these yields. Increased Transparency and Efficiency: Blockchain technology inherently brings transparency and efficiency. Tokenizing RWAs on platforms like Securitize enhances these aspects, making transactions and ownership more streamlined. Diversification of Yield Sources: Relying solely on crypto-native yields can be volatile. RWA tokenization diversifies yield sources, potentially offering more stable and predictable returns, especially from assets like U.S. Treasuries. Bridging TradFi and DeFi: Initiatives like BUIDL are crucial in bridging the gap between Traditional Finance (TradFi) and Decentralized Finance (DeFi). This integration can lead to greater adoption and innovation across both sectors. BlackRock‚Äôs entry into the RWA tokenization space with BUIDL is a strong validation of the technology‚Äôs potential. Avalon Labs supporting this initiative further solidifies the narrative that RWAs are not just a fleeting trend but a fundamental evolution in finance. Stablecoin Yield: sUSDa Leading the Charge In the competitive world of stablecoins, finding an edge is crucial. sUSDa is differentiating itself by not just being pegged to the US dollar, but by actively seeking to provide superior yield opportunities for its holders. The integration with BlackRock‚Äôs BUIDL is a testament to this commitment to enhance stablecoin yield . Here‚Äôs what makes sUSDa stand out in the stablecoin landscape: Feature sUSDa Typical Stablecoin Yield Source Dual: BTC On-Chain + U.S. Treasury RWA Primarily Lending/Staking within Crypto Ecosystem Asset Backing Bitcoin (BTC) Fiat Reserves, Cash Equivalents, Commercial Paper Yield Stability Potentially more stable due to diversification with U.S. Treasuries Subject to crypto market volatility Risk Profile Combines crypto and traditional finance risks Primarily crypto-native risks By offering exposure to U.S. Treasury yields, sUSDa is aiming to provide a more robust and potentially less volatile yield compared to stablecoins relying solely on crypto-native yield strategies. This approach could attract a broader range of users, including those traditionally hesitant about the risks associated with purely crypto-based yields. Avalon Labs USDa: A Smart Move for Bitcoin Holders? Is integrating with BlackRock BUIDL a smart move for Avalon Labs and USDa? Absolutely. For Bitcoin holders, the benefits are clear. Avalon Labs USDa is positioning itself as a forward-thinking stablecoin project that understands the evolving needs of the crypto investor. Here‚Äôs why this integration makes strategic sense: Attracting More BTC Holders: The promise of enhanced yield through RWA exposure is a powerful incentive to attract Bitcoin holders to the sUSDa ecosystem. Increasing sUSDa Utility: Beyond just being a stable store of value, sUSDa is becoming a yield-generating asset, significantly increasing its utility within the crypto space. Strengthening Avalon Labs‚Äô Position: By partnering with a financial giant like BlackRock and utilizing a platform like Securitize, Avalon Labs is bolstering its credibility and market position. Pioneering Innovation: This integration showcases Avalon Labs as a pioneer in exploring innovative yield generation strategies within the crypto market, specifically by leveraging RWAs. For Bitcoin holders seeking to maximize their returns without necessarily selling their BTC, sUSDa presents a compelling option. It‚Äôs about making your Bitcoin work harder for you, tapping into both the crypto and traditional finance yield landscapes. Navigating the Landscape of Tokenization and Yield Opportunities While the integration of BlackRock‚Äôs BUIDL into sUSDa presents exciting opportunities, it‚Äôs crucial to navigate the landscape with awareness. RWA tokenization and yield-bearing stablecoins are still relatively nascent areas, and understanding the nuances is key. Consider these points as you explore these opportunities: Risk Assessment: While U.S. Treasuries are considered low-risk, understanding the overall risk profile of sUSDa, including smart contract risks and the mechanics of yield generation, is essential. Platform Due Diligence: Securitize is a reputable platform for digital securities, but always conduct your own due diligence on any platform you use for interacting with digital assets. Regulatory Landscape: The regulatory landscape for digital assets and RWAs is still evolving. Staying informed about any regulatory changes that could impact these assets is important. Yield Sustainability: Understand the factors that drive the yields generated by BUIDL and sUSDa. While U.S. Treasury yields are generally stable, market conditions can still influence overall returns. Education and informed decision-making are paramount in the rapidly evolving world of crypto and tokenized assets. As always, ‚Äúdo your own research‚Äù (DYOR) before diving into any new investment opportunity. Conclusion: A Bold Step Towards the Future of Bitcoin Yield Avalon Labs‚Äô support for BlackRock‚Äôs BUIDL and the integration of RWA yields into sUSDa marks a significant milestone in the crypto space. It‚Äôs a bold step towards creating more sophisticated and diversified yield opportunities for Bitcoin holders. By bridging the gap between Bitcoin and traditional finance through stablecoin yield innovation and RWA tokenization, Avalon Labs is paving the way for a more interconnected and potentially more rewarding financial future. This move is not just about yield; it‚Äôs about showcasing the evolving utility of Bitcoin and the transformative power of blockchain technology in reshaping the financial landscape. Keep an eye on sUSDa ‚Äì it might just redefine how you think about earning yield on your Bitcoin. To learn more about the latest explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption.

title: Trump SEC Pick Paul Atkins‚Äô Crypto Ties Draw Sen. Warren‚Äôs Ire Ahead of Confirmation Hearing
body: Ahead of his confirmation hearing in front of the U.S. Senate Banking Committee tomorrow, Paul Atkins ‚Äî¬†President Donald Trump‚Äôs pick to lead the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) ‚Äî¬†disclosed having up to $6 million in crypto-related assets, prompting Sen. Elizabeth Warren (D-Mass.) to cry foul. In a Sunday letter to Atkins, Warren stressed that the former SEC commissioner‚Äôs background as a consultant and lobbyist for the financial industry could create ‚Äúsignificant conflicts of interest‚Äù if he is confirmed. ‚ÄúYou also have served as an expert witness hired by Wall Street firms accused of engaging in Ponzi schemes and other misconduct that you would now be responsible for investigating as SEC Chair. Furthermore, you have served as a Board Advisor to the Digital Chamber, a registered lobbying group for the crypto industry. In these roles, you and your firm were paid by the same companies that you would now be responsible for regulating,‚Äù Warren wrote. ‚ÄúThis will raise serious concerns about your impartiality and commitment to serving the public interest if you are confirmed to serve as the next SEC Chair.‚Äù Warren urged Atkins to consider mitigating these potential conflicts of interest by recusing himself from any SEC matters involving his former clients, and agreeing not to do any lobbying, consulting or other work for any companies in the industry regulated by the SEC for at least four years after his departure from the agency. Her letter requests a written response from Atkins by Thursday. Another letter, also dated Sunday, asked Atkins a series of questions about how he believed the cryptocurrency industry should be regulated, alongside other matters before the SEC's purview. Atkins‚Äô recent financial disclosures revealed a $328 million family fortune, according to Reuters , largely stemming from his wife‚Äôs family ties to roofing supply giant TAMKO Building Products. His risk consultancy firm, Patomak Global Partners ‚Äî¬†though which Atkins has done consulting for a range of companies, both crypto and traditional finance, and from which he has promised to divest if confirmed ‚Äî was valued at between $25 and $50 million, Reuters reported. Atkins‚Äô crypto-related assets were valued at up to $6 million, according to a report from Fortune , and include a combined $1 million in equity in crypto custodian Anchorage Digital and tokenization firm Securitize (Atkins held a board seat at Securitize until February). Atkins reported having up to a $5 million stake in the crypto investment firm Off the Chain Capital, where he is a limited partner. Off the Chain‚Äôs investments include private shares in big crypto companies like Digital Currency Group (DCG) and Kraken, as well as Mt. Gox bankruptcy claims. In a Tuesday filing with the Office of Government Ethics, Atkins pledged to divest from Off the Chain Capital within 120 days of his confirmation. He has also resigned from his position on the board of the Digital Chamber of Commerce and the Token Alliance of the Chamber of Digital Commerce according to the same filing. Atkins crypto ties are a stark contrast to his predecessor, former SEC Chair Gary Gensler, who was known for his so-called ‚Äúregulation by enforcement‚Äù approach to crypto regulation. Ahead of Atkins‚Äô confirmation, the SEC‚Äôs current leadership, spearheaded by Acting Chair Mark Uyeda and Commissioner Hester Peirce, have been overhauling the agency‚Äôs crypto regulation strategy, inviting industry players to roundtable discussions at the SEC‚Äôs headquarters in Washington, D.C. and backing down a considerable number of investigations and open litigation against crypto companies. However, not everyone that the SEC went after under Gensler is off the hook ‚Äî¬†the agency has not yet shut its probes into Unicoin or Crypto.com, both of which received Wells notices (a heads up of forthcoming enforcement charges) from the SEC last year. The SEC has shut down investigations into companies including Immutable, OpenSea and Yuga Labs, and ended litigation against companies like Coinbase, Kraken and Ripple since Uyeda took over the agency as acting chair.

title: Ripple CTO 2013 Interview: One of the Most Inspiring Interviews
body: Panos Mekras, co-founder of Anodos Finance, recently shared an archived 2013 interview with David Schwartz, Chief Cryptographer at Ripple, calling it one of the most inspiring discussions about the XRP Ledger (XRPL). In his tweet, Mekras reflected on the early vision for XRPL, particularly its potential to reshape financial transactions and reduce government control over monetary systems. The interview provides historical insight into Schwartz‚Äôs perspective on financial decentralization and the technological advancements introduced by XRPL. This interview by @JoelKatz from 2013 is really one of the most inspiring I have seen about XRPL. The OG vision was so amazing. "For the first time, individuals, exchanges, payment systems, and merchants can be directly interconnected. That‚Äôs a major shift in the status quo."‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/iI5vgzBlyp ‚Äî Panos {X} (@panosmek) March 24, 2025 Interconnecting Financial Systems In the interview, Schwartz described XRPL as a financial system that, for the first time, allowed individuals, exchanges, payment systems, and merchants to be directly interconnected. He explained that traditional payment systems operated in isolated silos, similar to how email functioned in its early days when users on different providers faced difficulties in communicating across platforms. Schwartz noted that XRPL was designed to solve this fragmentation by enabling seamless interactions between different financial entities, allowing payments to function more efficiently across borders and currencies. This vision represented a fundamental shift in financial infrastructure. At the time, payment systems were often controlled by banks and centralized intermediaries, limiting accessibility and interoperability. Schwartz emphasized that XRPL‚Äôs approach could reduce dependence on these intermediaries by offering a decentralized solution where transactions could be settled efficiently and transparently without third-party oversight. XRPL‚Äôs Role in Financial Freedom Another key point highlighted by Schwartz in the interview was XRPL‚Äôs potential to make it more difficult for repressive governments to use financial systems as tools of control. He compared XRPL‚Äôs impact to that of the Internet, which made it nearly impossible for authoritarian regimes to prevent access to external media and online discussions. According to Schwartz, XRPL could similarly prevent governments from enforcing the use of national currencies that they could manipulate or devalue. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Mekras emphasized this aspect of the interview in his tweet, noting that XRPL was originally referred to as Ripple, Ripple Protocol, or Ripple Network before the company Ripple Labs was known by its current name. He clarified that in the early days, Ripple Labs was called OpenCoin Inc., a detail that provides historical context for Schwartz‚Äôs statements. The Ongoing Relevance of XRPL‚Äôs Original Vision The 2013 interview underscores XRPL‚Äôs initial goal of fostering a more open and decentralized financial ecosystem. Schwartz‚Äôs perspective on financial autonomy remains relevant today, as debates around digital assets, monetary policy, and government intervention continue. By revisiting these foundational ideas, Mekras highlighted how XRPL was designed to provide an alternative to traditional banking systems , allowing for a more inclusive and censorship-resistant financial infrastructure. Mekras‚Äôs post is a reminder of XRPL‚Äôs long-term mission. As Schwartz articulated, the early vision focused on financial accessibility, efficiency, and resistance to centralized control. As blockchain technology evolves, XRPL helps shape the future of digital transactions, reflecting the principles set out more than a decade ago. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. title: Ghibli-inspired memecoins flood the market ‚Äì What are they and their obsession?
body: Almost everyone on the internet has used or seen a Ghibli portrait today, the Japanese animation studio-style image that Elon Musk, Mark Zuckerberg, Ripple Labs executives, and others have shared since ChatGPT launched its latest update. On Tuesday, OpenAI introduced image generation capabilities to its GPT-4o model, allowing users to create AI-generated visuals directly within ChatGPT. Almost immediately, social media platforms were flooded with artwork mimicking the aesthetic of Studio Ghibli, the animation powerhouse behind films such as Spirited Away and My Neighbor Totoro . Crypto KOLs using Ghilbi-images Among the notable names that jumped into the Ghilbi-inspired image train are billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk and OpenAI CEO Sam Altman, who have shared AI-generated portraits of themselves in the Ghibli style. X CEO Musk, who has previously influenced memecoin markets of Dogecoin (DOGE) and Shiba Inu (SHIB) through his posts, shared a Ghilbi-fied version of a picture in the popular 1994 musical cartoon film The Lion King, which shows Rafiki the mandrill holding up Mufasa. Theme of the day pic.twitter.com/2ioG0StAxL ‚Äî Elon Musk (@elonmusk) March 26, 2025 Some of the most widely shared images on social media include a reimagining of former US President Donald Trump‚Äôs February 28 meeting with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy, a Hide the Pain Harold meme shared by trading platform Crypto.com, and an AI-generated rendering of President John F. Kennedy‚Äôs assassination. What a G(hibli) Morning. pic.twitter.com/waNYrECGKf ‚Äî Crypto.com (@cryptocom) March 27, 2025 Ripple executives David Schwartz and Brad Garlinghouse also posted their Ghibli-style anime portraits, where the former asked his followers if ‚Äúhe did it right.‚Äù Am I doing this right? pic.twitter.com/OltPmOc6Jt ‚Äî David "JoelKatz" Schwartz (@JoelKatz) March 26, 2025 Neither Musk nor Altman made direct references to any Ghibli-themed cryptocurrency, but the viral trend has birthed an expected surge in memecoins. The most prominent among them, Ghiblification (GHIBLI), has exponentially risen in valuation since it was launched on March 26. According to data from DEX Screener, GHIBLI reached a market capitalization of $20.8 million just 19 hours after going live. The memecoin is now changing hands at $0.01788, a whopping 30,382% uptick in the last 24 hours. GHILBI/SOL price chart. Source: DEX Screener DEX Screener also shows that the memecoin recorded nearly $77 million in trading volumes within the first 24 hours of going live from over 250,000 individual trades. The token‚Äôs liquidity pool holds just over $330,000 worth of SOL, indicating the maximum amount GHIBLI holders can exchange their holdings for, pending price declines. At least 20 other Ghibli-related tokens have emerged in the past 24 hours, each seeking to capitalize on the trend. Still, several members of the crypto community are convinced the coins will all plummet when the ‚Äúfun element‚Äù of the images wears off. ‚ÄúPraying the memecoin runs to $100M to bring some hope into these markets. Severely needed,‚Äù said one crypto trader on X. Did OpenAI violate copyright laws in training ChatGPT? Ghibli-style AI art may have given the internet reasons to laugh, but it has also raised concerns about OpenAI ‚Äôs data practices. Like many of its AI competitors, the company has not disclosed the specific datasets used to train its models. Still, users are questioning the accuracy with which its system easily replicates Ghibli‚Äôs hand-drawn aesthetic in a matter of minutes. They believe OpenAI may have trained its model on copyrighted content without permission. An OpenAI spokesperson has released a statement to address these allegations, explaining that the company simply wants to provide users with creative freedom and has employed restrictive policies to prevent them from misusing the product. ‚ÄúWe continue to prevent generations in the style of individual living artists, but we do permit more studio styles, which people have used to generate and share some truly delightful and inspired original fan creations,‚Äù the spokesperson wrote. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre always learning from real-world use and feedback, and we‚Äôll keep refining our policies as we go.‚Äù Cryptopolitan Academy: Want to grow your money in 2025? Learn how to do it with DeFi in our upcoming webclass. Save Your Spot

title: Exciting Breakthrough: Cosmos Achieves IBC Transaction to Ethereum, Unlocking Cross-Chain Future
body: In a monumental leap for blockchain technology, Cosmos (ATOM) developers have successfully demonstrated cross-chain interoperability by executing an Inter-Blockchain Communication (IBC) transaction with Ethereum. This exciting development, initially reported by The Block, signifies a major stride towards a more interconnected and collaborative blockchain ecosystem. Maghnus Mareneck, co-CEO of Interchain Labs, confirmed the successful test from Cosmos Hub to Ethereum, emphasizing the drive to enhance native interoperability between these two significant blockchain networks. This update is slated to be a key feature of the upcoming IBC-go v10 ‚ÄúEureka‚Äù upgrade, promising to usher in a new era of seamless asset and data transfer between previously siloed blockchains. Understanding the Significance of Cosmos IBC and Ethereum Interoperability Why is this news generating such buzz within the crypto community? To truly appreciate the magnitude of this achievement, let‚Äôs delve into the core concepts: Cosmos (ATOM): Often referred to as the ‚ÄúInternet of Blockchains,‚Äù Cosmos is designed to solve the challenges of blockchain fragmentation. It aims to enable different blockchains to communicate and transact with each other in a decentralized manner. Inter-Blockchain Communication (IBC): IBC is the flagship protocol of Cosmos, acting as a standardized framework for blockchains to exchange data and assets securely and reliably. Think of it as the TCP/IP protocol for blockchains, laying the foundation for true blockchain interoperability. Ethereum: The world‚Äôs second-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization and a dominant platform for decentralized applications (dApps), Ethereum hosts a vast ecosystem of projects and assets. However, like many blockchains, it has historically operated in relative isolation. The ability to bridge Cosmos and Ethereum via IBC is a game-changer because it directly addresses the long-standing issue of blockchain silos. Imagine a future where you can seamlessly move assets and data between different blockchain networks as easily as sending an email across different internet providers. This is the vision that Cosmos and IBC are striving to realize, and this recent test with Ethereum is a powerful validation of that vision. The Benefits of Cosmos IBC Integration with Ethereum: Unlocking New Possibilities The successful cross-chain interoperability test between Cosmos and Ethereum opens up a plethora of benefits for both ecosystems and the broader crypto space. Let‚Äôs explore some key advantages: Enhanced Liquidity and Capital Efficiency: Bridging Cosmos and Ethereum can unlock significant liquidity. Assets locked within the Cosmos ecosystem can now potentially flow into the vast DeFi landscape of Ethereum, and vice versa. This increased flow of capital can lead to greater efficiency and opportunities for users across both platforms. Expanded Use Cases for dApps: Developers building decentralized applications on either Cosmos or Ethereum can now tap into the resources and functionalities of both chains. For instance, a dApp on Cosmos could leverage Ethereum‚Äôs extensive smart contract ecosystem, or an Ethereum-based dApp could benefit from Cosmos‚Äôs scalability solutions. This fosters innovation and expands the potential use cases for blockchain technology. Streamlined User Experience: For end-users, blockchain interoperability means a more seamless and user-friendly experience. Imagine being able to manage assets across different blockchains from a single interface, without the complexities of centralized exchanges or cumbersome bridging solutions. IBC integration promises to simplify the user journey and make blockchain technology more accessible to a wider audience. Strengthened Blockchain Ecosystem: By fostering greater communication and collaboration between blockchains, initiatives like the Cosmos-Ethereum IBC bridge contribute to a more robust and resilient overall blockchain ecosystem. Interoperability reduces fragmentation and promotes a more unified and interconnected web3 landscape. Challenges and Considerations in Achieving Full Interoperability While the successful test transaction is a major milestone, it‚Äôs important to acknowledge that achieving full and seamless blockchain interoperability is not without its challenges. Some key considerations include: Security Concerns: Cross-chain bridges, while powerful, can also introduce new security vulnerabilities. Ensuring the security and robustness of the IBC bridge between Cosmos and Ethereum is paramount to prevent potential exploits and protect user assets. Rigorous testing and auditing are crucial. Technical Complexity: Implementing and maintaining interoperability solutions is technically complex. Different blockchains have varying architectures and consensus mechanisms, requiring sophisticated engineering to establish reliable and efficient communication channels. Continuous development and adaptation are necessary. Governance and Standardization: As interoperability efforts expand, questions of governance and standardization become increasingly important. Establishing common protocols and standards for cross-chain communication will be vital to ensure seamless and consistent interoperability across the broader blockchain space. Adoption and Network Effects: For ATOM Ethereum bridge to reach its full potential, widespread adoption is essential. Encouraging developers and projects on both Cosmos and Ethereum to leverage IBC will be crucial to building network effects and realizing the transformative potential of cross-chain communication. Examples of Potential Applications: What Can We Expect? The practical applications of Cosmos IBC connecting to Ethereum are vast and varied. Here are a few examples of what we might see in the near future: Application Description Impact Cross-Chain DeFi Platforms Decentralized Finance (DeFi) platforms that operate across both Cosmos and Ethereum, allowing users to access lending, borrowing, and trading opportunities across both ecosystems. Increased capital efficiency, wider range of DeFi services, and reduced fragmentation in the DeFi space. Interoperable NFT Marketplaces Non-Fungible Token (NFT) marketplaces that support NFTs from both Cosmos and Ethereum, enabling users to buy, sell, and trade NFTs across different blockchain ecosystems. Expanded NFT market reach, increased liquidity for NFT assets, and greater flexibility for NFT collectors and creators. Cross-Chain Data Oracles Data oracles that can securely and reliably relay data between Cosmos and Ethereum, enabling smart contracts on either chain to access real-world information from the other ecosystem. More robust and versatile smart contracts, enhanced capabilities for decentralized applications, and improved data availability across blockchains. Simplified Asset Transfers User-friendly interfaces and tools that simplify the process of transferring assets between Cosmos and Ethereum, making it easier for users to manage their crypto holdings across different chains. Improved user experience, increased accessibility to cross-chain functionality, and reduced barriers to entry for new users. Actionable Insights: What Does This Mean for You? For crypto enthusiasts, developers, and investors, the Cosmos IBC and Ethereum integration presents several actionable insights: Keep an Eye on IBC-go v10 ‚ÄúEureka‚Äù Upgrade: The upcoming upgrade will be crucial forÊ≠£Âºè launching the IBC bridge to Ethereum. Stay informed about its progress and anticipated release date. Explore Cosmos and Ethereum Ecosystems: Familiarize yourself with projects and opportunities within both the Cosmos and Ethereum ecosystems. The integration is likely to create new avenues for participation and investment. Consider Developing Cross-Chain dApps: For developers, this is an opportune moment to explore building decentralized applications that leverage the interoperability between Cosmos and Ethereum. This could lead to innovative and impactful solutions. Stay Updated on Interoperability Trends: Cosmos IBC Ethereum bridge is part of a broader trend towards blockchain interoperability. Follow developments in this space to understand the evolving landscape and identify future opportunities. Conclusion: A Transformative Step Towards a Connected Blockchain Future The successful test of an IBC transaction between Cosmos and Ethereum is more than just a technical achievement; it‚Äôs a transformative step towards realizing the long-held vision of a truly interconnected blockchain future. By breaking down the walls between blockchain silos, Cosmos and Ethereum are paving the way for a more collaborative, efficient, and user-friendly crypto ecosystem. While challenges remain, this exciting breakthrough represents a significant leap forward and signals a promising direction for the evolution of blockchain technology. The future of crypto is increasingly looking cross-chain, and Cosmos and Ethereum are at the forefront of this revolution. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum price action.

title: Revolutionary Partnership: Korbit & Shinhan Bank Unleash Crypto Services for Corporate Giants
body: In a significant move poised to reshape the South Korean cryptocurrency landscape, Korbit, a leading crypto exchange, has announced a groundbreaking partnership with Shinhan Bank, one of the nation‚Äôs largest financial institutions. This collaboration is strategically designed to amplify crypto services for corporate clients , aligning perfectly with the burgeoning regulatory framework for virtual assets in South Korea. Are you ready to witness how this alliance could redefine institutional crypto adoption? Korbit and Shinhan Bank: A Strategic Alliance for Corporate Crypto Expansion The partnership between Korbit and Shinhan Bank is not just another collaboration; it‚Äôs a calculated maneuver to tap into the growing demand for sophisticated crypto services from institutional players. According to reports from Dailian, both entities are meticulously crafting a robust collaboration system aimed at attracting a diverse range of corporate clients , including government agencies, public companies, and non-profit organizations. This proactive approach signals a clear intention to establish themselves as pioneers in the institutional crypto space within South Korea . Here‚Äôs a breakdown of what this strategic partnership entails: Targeting Institutional Growth: The primary objective is to cater to the increasing interest from institutional investors and corporate entities in digital assets. Building a Robust Collaboration System: Korbit and Shinhan Bank are jointly developing infrastructure and services tailored to meet the complex needs of corporate clients. Engaging with Key Sectors: Their outreach extends to government bodies, public sector companies, and non-profit organizations, indicating a broad spectrum of potential corporate clients. Regulatory Alignment: This initiative is perfectly timed with South Korea‚Äôs move to establish a comprehensive regulatory framework for virtual assets, ensuring compliance and fostering trust. Why Focus on Corporate Clients for Crypto Services? The shift towards corporate clients in the crypto services sector is a global trend, and for good reason. Institutional investors and corporations bring substantial capital, stability, and maturity to the often-volatile cryptocurrency market. By focusing on corporate clients , Korbit and Shinhan Bank are tapping into a segment that promises sustained growth and reduced market volatility. Consider these compelling factors: Factor Impact on Crypto Market Increased Capital Inflow Corporate investments inject significant capital, enhancing market liquidity and stability. Enhanced Market Legitimacy Institutional involvement lends credibility to the crypto market, attracting broader adoption. Sophisticated Investment Strategies Corporate clients often employ advanced strategies, leading to a more mature and efficient market. Long-Term Investment Horizon Unlike retail investors, corporations typically have longer investment horizons, reducing short-term volatility. Shinhan Bank‚Äôs Bold Step into Institutional Crypto Services Shinhan Bank ‚Äôs decision to partner with Korbit underscores the growing acceptance of cryptocurrencies within traditional financial institutions. For Shinhan Bank , this collaboration represents a strategic diversification, allowing them to offer cutting-edge crypto services and stay ahead in a rapidly evolving financial landscape. By embracing this innovative partnership, Shinhan Bank is signaling its commitment to meeting the future demands of its corporate clients and positioning itself as a forward-thinking leader in South Korea ‚Äòs financial sector. Shinhan Bank ‚Äôs motivations are multifaceted: Diversification of Services: Expanding into crypto services allows Shinhan Bank to diversify its offerings and attract a new segment of corporate clients. Competitive Advantage: Being an early mover in institutional crypto services gives Shinhan Bank a competitive edge over other traditional banks in South Korea. Meeting Client Demand: As corporate interest in crypto assets grows, Shinhan Bank is proactively responding to the evolving needs of its clients. Innovation and Future-Proofing: Embracing crypto innovation ensures Shinhan Bank remains relevant and adaptable in the face of technological disruptions in the financial industry. Korbit: Pioneering Crypto Exchange Innovation in South Korea Korbit has long been recognized as a pioneering force in the South Korean crypto exchange market. Known for its robust security measures and user-friendly platform, Korbit is well-positioned to lead this new wave of institutional crypto services . Their partnership with Shinhan Bank further solidifies Korbit ‚Äòs reputation as an innovator and a trusted platform for both retail and now, crucially, corporate clients seeking sophisticated crypto services . Korbit ‚Äôs strengths in this partnership include: Established Crypto Expertise: Korbit brings deep-seated knowledge and experience in cryptocurrency trading, custody, and related services. Technological Infrastructure: Korbit‚Äôs advanced platform and security protocols are essential for handling the complex needs of institutional clients. Regulatory Compliance Experience: Navigating the evolving regulatory landscape in South Korea is a core competency of Korbit. Market Leadership: As a leading exchange in South Korea, Korbit has the market presence and brand recognition to attract corporate clients. Navigating South Korea‚Äôs Evolving Regulatory Framework for Virtual Assets The timing of this partnership is particularly noteworthy as South Korea is actively developing a comprehensive regulatory framework for virtual assets . This proactive regulatory environment provides a foundation of clarity and legitimacy for crypto services , making it an opportune moment for Korbit and Shinhan Bank to expand their offerings to corporate clients . The regulatory clarity reduces uncertainty and fosters a more secure and compliant environment for institutional crypto adoption in South Korea . Key aspects of South Korea‚Äôs regulatory landscape include: Virtual Assets Act: South Korea is progressing with legislation to regulate virtual assets, providing legal definitions and compliance standards. Financial Authority Oversight: The financial authorities are actively involved in shaping and enforcing crypto regulations, ensuring market integrity. Anti-Money Laundering (AML) Compliance: Stringent AML requirements are being implemented for crypto exchanges and service providers. Investor Protection Measures: Regulations are designed to protect investors, enhancing trust and confidence in the crypto market. Unlocking Benefits for Corporate Clients: What to Expect from Korbit & Shinhan Bank‚Äôs Crypto Services Corporate clients stand to gain significantly from the enhanced crypto services offered through the Korbit and Shinhan Bank partnership. These benefits extend beyond mere access to crypto trading, encompassing a holistic suite of institutional-grade solutions. For corporate clients in South Korea , this partnership unlocks new avenues for investment, diversification, and technological advancement within the crypto space. Anticipated benefits for corporate clients include: Institutional-Grade Custody Solutions: Secure and compliant custody services tailored for corporate asset management. Seamless Integration with Banking Services: Smooth integration with Shinhan Bank‚Äôs existing banking infrastructure for efficient fund management. Dedicated Corporate Account Management: Personalized support and account management services catering to the specific needs of corporate clients. Access to Diverse Crypto Products: A wider range of crypto investment products and services beyond basic trading. Regulatory Compliance Assurance: Services designed to meet and exceed South Korean regulatory requirements for virtual assets. Challenges and Opportunities in Expanding Crypto Services to Institutions While the partnership between Korbit and Shinhan Bank presents immense opportunities, it‚Äôs also crucial to acknowledge the challenges inherent in expanding crypto services to institutions. Navigating regulatory complexities, ensuring robust security, and educating corporate clients about the nuances of crypto investments are all significant hurdles. However, these challenges are overshadowed by the vast potential for growth and innovation in the institutional crypto market within South Korea . Key challenges and opportunities: Challenge Opportunity Regulatory Uncertainty (Despite Progress) Shaping future regulations through proactive engagement and compliance. Security Risks and Cyber Threats Developing and implementing cutting-edge security measures and protocols. Client Education and Onboarding Providing comprehensive educational resources and tailored onboarding processes. Market Volatility Offering risk management tools and strategies to mitigate volatility concerns. Conclusion: A Transformative Leap for South Korean Crypto The collaboration between Korbit and Shinhan Bank marks a transformative moment for the South Korean cryptocurrency market. By joining forces to deliver tailored crypto services to corporate clients , they are not only capitalizing on the burgeoning institutional interest in digital assets but also paving the way for a more mature and regulated crypto ecosystem. This partnership is a bold stride towards mainstream adoption, promising to unlock new possibilities for corporate engagement with cryptocurrencies and solidify South Korea ‚Äòs position as a leading hub for crypto innovation. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption.

title: Bitcoin Whales Bought $11B of BTC in Two Weeks as Confidence Grew, Glassnode Says
body: While macroeconomic uncertainty and technical indicators raise doubts about bitcoin's ( BTC ) recent gains, purchasing activity by some of the largest investors indicates a more optimistic outlook. Since March 11, so-called bitcoin whales have snapped up over 129,000 BTC, worth $11.2 billion at the market price of $87,500, according to data tracked by blockchain analytics firm Glassnode . That's the most significant accumulation rate since August 2024, indicating growing confidence in the largest cryptocurrency among the biggest market participants, Glassnode commented on X. BTC has regained some poise, since reaching lows under $78K roughly two weeks ago. The recovery has been led by dovish comments from Federal Reserve and optimism that impending Trump tariffs on April 2 will be more measured than expected. Glassnode's analysis revealed that crypto whale addresses with over 10,000 BTC compensating for continued selling by small holders. Other indicators, such as the "Bitcoin 1Y+ HOLD wave," tracked by Bitbo Charts show a renewed upswing, indicating a shift to a holding strategy, as Wednesday's edition of the Crypto Daybook Americas noted .

title: WhiteRock Boosts XRP Ledger (XRPL) With $70M: Details
body: WhiteRock has officially deployed its XRP Ledger (XRPL) integration, marking a significant milestone in the decentralized finance (DeFi) space. In an announcement shared on X , WhiteRock confirmed that its launch began with $70 million in total value locked (TVL) from whitelist commitments. This achievement establishes WhiteRock as the largest protocol operating on the XRP Ledger, further strengthening the network‚Äôs expanding DeFi ecosystem. Our XRP Ledger integration has officially deployed, starting with $70M in TVL from our whitelist commitments. That makes us the largest protocol on the XRP Ledger by @Ripple . Full announcement pic.twitter.com/mRUXQyJwlJ ‚Äî WhiteRock (@WhiteRock_Fi) March 26, 2025 A Major Leap for DeFi on the XRP Ledger The XRP Ledger, developed by Ripple , is renowned for its efficiency, low fees, and scalability. Historically, it has been primarily focused on payments and cross-border remittances, but the increasing adoption of DeFi solutions has driven new integrations. WhiteRock‚Äôs deployment is a testament to XRPL‚Äôs growing appeal as a foundation for decentralized applications (dApps) and financial services. With $70 million in TVL from early commitments, WhiteRock‚Äôs integration is setting new standards in liquidity and institutional-grade DeFi solutions on XRPL. TVL is a crucial metric that reflects the total assets locked in a DeFi protocol, indicating the level of trust and engagement from users. By launching with such a significant amount, WhiteRock has demonstrated confidence in both its platform and the XRPL ecosystem. What This Means for XRP and DeFi Adoption The integration of WhiteRock into the XRP Ledger is expected to accelerate the adoption of DeFi solutions within the network. As the largest protocol by TVL on XRPL, WhiteRock is positioned to attract institutional and retail investors looking for secure, high-performance decentralized financial services. Key benefits of this integration include: Enhanced Liquidity: The substantial TVL ensures greater market depth and efficient trade execution. Increased Utility for XRPL: By expanding beyond payments into DeFi, XRPL strengthens its position as a versatile blockchain. Institutional-Grade Solutions: WhiteRock‚Äôs commitment to security and compliance makes it an attractive option for institutional investors entering the DeFi space. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 The Future of WhiteRock on XRPL The successful deployment of WhiteRock on the XRP Ledger is just the beginning. As the protocol expands, it could introduce new DeFi products such as lending, staking, and automated market-making (AMM) solutions tailored to the unique capabilities of XRPL. Furthermore, the integration aligns with Ripple‚Äôs broader vision of increasing financial inclusion and providing cost-effective blockchain-based financial solutions. With continued growth in DeFi and real-world asset tokenization, WhiteRock‚Äôs presence on XRPL could pave the way for further innovations within the ecosystem. WhiteRock‚Äôs launch on the XRP Ledger, backed by $70 million in TVL, marks a transformative moment for DeFi on XRPL. As the largest protocol on the network, it reinforces the growing institutional interest in XRP‚Äôs blockchain capabilities. With a strong foundation and increasing adoption, WhiteRock‚Äôs integration signals a promising future for decentralized finance within the XRP ecosystem. title: Rep. Steil Wants Crypto Bills Passed ‚ÄúIn Tandem‚Äù: Here‚Äôs the Strategy
body: Legislators will pursue the stablecoin bill and the crypto market structure simultaneously. Stablecoins and market structure interact in a way that benefits both sectors. Lawmakers are working towards meeting President Trump‚Äôs August deadline. U.S. Representative Bryan Steil (R-WI) argues Congress should advance stablecoin regulation and crypto market structure legislation in tandem. Steil contends the two areas are interconnected and progress together benefits both the stablecoin and broader crypto sectors. Senate Momentum, Trump Deadline Fuel Push for Action Steil expressed his opinion during a recent podcast , highlighting the increased energy from the Senate toward the stablecoin bill after President Donald Trump urged the bill to be ready before the August recess. Trump‚Äôs request fueled speculation among crypto watchers about imminent bills potentially redefining the U.S. crypto landscape. Steil, who chairs the House Financial Services Subcommittee covering digital assets, fintech, and AI, views the Senate as a partner and plans to match their pace. title: Solix Raises $29.5M to Revolutionize Decentralized Internet Infrastructure
body: The post Solix Raises $29.5M to Revolutionize Decentralized Internet Infrastructure appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Solix DePIN, a pioneer in decentralized physical infrastructure networks, has secured $29.5 million in funding from Eclip Foundation. This investment will accelerate the development of Solix‚Äôs groundbreaking MODEL CONTEXT PROTOCOL (MCP) technology, which enables intelligent bandwidth sharing without affecting users‚Äô internet experience. Founded with the mission to transform how internet bandwidth is shared and monetized, Solix has created a platform where users can contribute their unused bandwidth and earn rewards through a simple browser extension. This approach addresses critical challenges in today‚Äôs internet landscape, including bandwidth inequality and inefficient resource allocation. ‚ÄúWe designed Solix with simplicity and accessibility as core principles,‚Äù said David Rodriguez, CEO of Solix DePIN. ‚ÄúBy removing technical barriers to entry, we‚Äôre enabling anyone with an internet connection to participate in the decentralized economy and be rewarded for sharing resources they already have.‚Äù The MODEL CONTEXT PROTOCOL at the heart of Solix‚Äôs technology represents a significant advancement in the DePIN space. This innovative protocol connects AI models to real-time contextual data about internet usage, allowing for dynamic, intelligent decision-making on bandwidth allocation. Unlike traditional bandwidth sharing solutions that operate on fixed rules, MCP ensures that users‚Äô internet experience remains uncompromised. Our MODEL CONTEXT PROTOCOL implementation is what truly sets Solix apart in the DePIN ecosystem,‚Äù explained Emily Richardson, Chief Technology Officer at Solix. ‚ÄúMCP allows for sophisticated real-time analysis of bandwidth availability, creating an optimal balance between sharing resources and maintaining exceptional user experience.‚Äù The company‚Äôs user-friendly approach has driven impressive adoption metrics. Solix currently boasts over 100,000 active users across more than 63 countries, processing approximately 275 TB of data daily. These figures demonstrate both the robust infrastructure and growing demand for decentralized bandwidth solutions. Eclip Foundation, known for backing transformative Web3 technologies, recognized Solix‚Äôs potential to reshape internet resource distribution. ‚ÄúSolix represents exactly the kind of innovation we aim to support ‚Äì solutions that combine technical excellence with practical utility and broad market potential,‚Äù said James Wilson, Managing Partner at Eclip Foundation. The $29.5 million investment will fund several key initiatives on Solix‚Äôs roadmap. These include enhancing the core technology, expanding global reach, and introducing advanced features such as smart bandwidth allocation and AI-powered network optimization. The company also plans to establish strategic partnerships with cloud service providers and content delivery networks to create broader use cases for its decentralized bandwidth marketplace. As internet bandwidth demands continue to grow exponentially with the rise of AI, streaming services, and IoT devices, Solix‚Äôs decentralized approach offers a scalable and sustainable alternative to traditional bandwidth provisioning. The platform‚Äôs ability to dynamically adjust to network demands ensures optimal performance while maximizing rewards for contributors. Participating in the Solix network is straightforward ‚Äì users simply download and activate the Solix browser extension. Once running, the extension intelligently allocates a portion of the user‚Äôs unused bandwidth to the network, automatically earning them SLIX Points for their contribution. With this significant funding round, Solix is positioned to lead the next wave of innovation in decentralized infrastructure, creating a more accessible, efficient, and equitable internet experience for users worldwide. About Solix DePIN Solix DePIN is a decentralized physical infrastructure network enabling users to share and monetize their excess bandwidth. As the first DePIN project implementing Multi-Chain Protocol (MCP), Solix creates a more accessible, efficient, and equitable internet experience. Solix is committed to building a user-centric sharing economy for digital resources. Media Contact: Email: business@solixdepin.net Twitter: https://x.com/solix_depin SOURCE: Solix DePIN

title: Ripple Taps Chipper Cash To Foster Crypto Payments in Africa
body: In the latest development, Ripple announced a strategic collaboration with Chipper Cash to expand its payment solutions to Africa. Through Ripple Payments, the partnership intends to foster cross border payments in the African regions. Notably, the crypto platform‚Äôs alliance with Chipper Cash provides a fast, low-cost, and efficient payment system that unites international markets. Let‚Äôs delve deeper into the partnership‚Äôs goals and its potential implications. Ripple Teams Up with Chipper Cash: Know the Details In an official blog post published today, Ripple revealed its partnership with payments provider Chipper Cash. The crypto platform‚Äôs new venture focuses on supporting cross-border payments into Africa using Ripple Payments. Leveraging the potential of blockchain technology, the companies aim to bring faster, easier, and productive payment system. As pointed out by Reece Merrick, Managing Director of Ripple Africa, the partnership plays a key role in the platform‚Äôs expansion in Africa. Merric further commented, By integrating our technology into Chipper Cash‚Äôs platform, we‚Äôre enabling faster, more affordable cross-border payments while driving economic growth and innovation across the markets they serve. With over a decade of experience in tokenizing real-world assets, Ripple‚Äôs journey began by bringing fiat currencies on-chain to simplify international money transfers. Ripple Expands to Africa for Crypto Payments Significantly, Ripple marked its entry into Africa in 2023 through a partnership with Onafriq. Now, the company is further expanding its presence on the continent with Chipper Cash. According to Reece Merrick, the growing demand for cross-border payments worldwide is driving companies like Chipper Cash to adopt crypto payments, thereby boosting efficiency and fostering innovation. Acknowledging the potential of crypto-enabled payments, Ham Serunjogi, Co-Founder and CEO at Chipper Cash, highlighted the significance of its alliance with Ripple. The Chipper Cash founder cited, ‚ÄúThrough integrating with Ripple‚Äôs global payments network, we are excited to be able to harness the transformative potential of blockchain technology to enable consumers to receive payments faster and at lower cost.‚Äù In a recent development, Ripple joined hands with Unicambio , Portugal‚Äôs leading currency exchange provider for cross-border payments. This move aligns with the platform‚Äôs vision of global expansion. XRP Lawsuit Settlement Opens Doors To New Collaborations With the protracted XRP lawsuit now resolved, as Ripple withdraws its cross-appeal in response to the SEC‚Äôs dropped appeal, the stage is set for new partnerships and collaborations. All Things XRP, a prominent member of the Ripple community, shared insights on the possible outcomes of the XRP case conclusion, which included future partnerships. The lawsuit update also opens door to the possible launch of XRP exchange-traded funds (ETFs). The US SEC has already acknowledged the ETF applications submitted by multiple asset managers. Now, the lawsuit outcome could potentially clear the way for the ETF approval. The post Ripple Taps Chipper Cash To Foster Crypto Payments in Africa appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Investment Giant Bitwise Announces Two Bullish and One Bearish Scenarios for XRP! Lists Expected Price Targets!
body: While the SEC-Ripple case is coming to an end, XRP did not experience the expected movement. However, while analysts were expecting the XRP price to rise, a detailed report came from the $12 billion asset management company Bitwise. While Bitwise listed its predictions for 2025 and 2030, it also explained the bear-bull scenarios. In the maximum price scenario, Bitwise expects XRP to close at $4.48 in 2025, reach $6.53 in 2026, and $9.60 in 2027. Bitwise predicts that XRP will trade at $13.84 in 2028, reaching $20.14 in 2029 and $29.32 in 2030. Bitwise stated that its maximum price scenario is based on XRP capturing a large share of the payment and tokenization markets. The Bull Scenario! Bitwise also announced its expected price estimates for the bull scenario. Using the annual return formula for the bull scenario, Bitwise announced its estimates based on an annual return of 27%. Accordingly, Bitwsie expects the price of XRP to rise to $12.70 by 2030. He predicted that XRP could reach $3.90 in 2025, $4.94 in 2026, $6.25 in 2027, $7.91 in 2028, enter the double-digit range at $10.02 in 2029, and $12.68 in 2030. Bear Scenario! Bitwise also outlined a possible bear scenario for XRP. Accordingly, Bitwise expects XRP to close 2025 at $1.82. According to the bear scenario, XRP is predicted to close 2026 at $1.07, 2027 at $0.63, 2028 at $0.37, 2029 at $0.22, and 2030 at $0.13. *This is not investment advice. title: The great appchain migration: Uniswap‚Äôs shift to custom infrastructure is part of a larger trend | Opinion
body: Disclosure: The views and opinions expressed here belong solely to the author and do not represent the views and opinions of crypto.news‚Äô editorial. Web3 is undergoing a seismic shift. Some of the industry‚Äôs biggest and most established players‚Äîincluding giants like Uniswap and Kraken ‚Äîare beginning to outgrow general-purpose blockchains, like Base and Solana, that have long been considered central pillars of DeFi. They are part of an accelerating movement toward custom-built appchains that will pave the way for a more tailored and efficient era of blockchain infrastructure. You might also like: Web2 has failed the planet‚ÄîIt‚Äôs up to web3 to fix it | Opinion The hard ceiling on general-purpose blockchains General-purpose blockchains were instrumental in the rise of web3. Ethereum, Solana, and Base provided the liquidity of users and foundational ecosystems that allowed decentralized applications to flourish. These platforms connected developers and communities, creating the network effects necessary to bootstrap the early stages of web3 innovation. However, as the industry matures, the inherent limitations of general-purpose chains become increasingly evident. Shared infrastructure, high fees, and rigid tokenomics often force large-scale projects to compromise on performance, costs, or user experience. Uniswap‚Äôs recent launch of UniChain , a custom L2 designed for optimized functionality, is a clear example of this shift. Similarly, Kraken‚Äôs move to build an Ethereum L2 Superchain underscores the growing need for tailored infrastructure. These companies have reached a scale where the benefits of shared blockchains are increasingly not worth the costs. This is not an isolated trend. Once projects hit a critical mass, the economics and control offered by custom appchains, or application-specific blockchains, become too compelling to ignore. The appchain advantage By designing their own appchain infrastructure, projects can optimize for performance, reduce costs, and align more effectively with their specific needs. One of the most notable advantages of appchains is scalability. On general-purpose blockchains, applications must compete for blockspace and operate within predefined constraints, which can lead to congestion and unpredictable fees. Appchains remove these limitations by giving projects a dedicated environment where they can fine-tune performance, integrate custom features, and scale without external bottlenecks. A gaming studio, for example, could eliminate transaction delays by designing an appchain that prioritizes high-speed interactions and removes fees that disrupt player immersion, ensuring a more seamless and engaging gameplay experience. Cost efficiency is another critical factor. Operating on a shared blockchain often means high gas fees, particularly during periods of network congestion. Appchains let projects control their own cost structures, optimizing for throughput while keeping transaction fees low‚Äîor even eliminating them entirely. This is particularly valuable for applications that require frequent on-chain interactions, such as automated trading platforms, NFT marketplaces, or play-to-earn games. Appchains are also opening the door for web2 companies looking to integrate blockchain technology. Businesses accustomed to tightly controlled and highly optimized infrastructure often find general-purpose blockchains too restrictive. In web2, seamless user experience is paramount, and companies can‚Äôt afford to compromise performance for the sake of decentralization. Appchains allow them to adopt blockchain technology on their own terms, preserving the flexibility and reliability they need. A loyalty rewards program, for example, could build an appchain that allows users to seamlessly earn, trade, and redeem points while preserving the slick user experience their customers expect. This would be much more difficult to achieve on a congested general-purpose blockchain Historically, one of the biggest concerns with appchains was the risk of ecosystem fragmentation. Critics argued that launching independent chains would lead to a balkanized project landscape, reducing accessibility and liquidity. However, advancements in interoperability solutions, such as LayerZero and Avalanche‚Äôs subnets, have eliminated this concern. Appchains can now seamlessly connect with broader blockchain ecosystems, enabling assets and data to move freely between networks. This means projects can enjoy the benefits of a dedicated chain without sacrificing cross-chain connectivity‚Äîmaking appchains a superior alternative to general-purpose blockchains for both startups and established enterprises. Entering the L1 appchain era As more projects join in the transition toward appchains, we will see a new era of purpose-built blockchains, each optimized for a unique set of goals and challenges. Within this appchain revolution, projects will continue seeking more control over their infrastructure, communities, and tokenomics, ultimately gravitating toward L1 appchain solutions. Unlike general-purpose blockchains, which impose fixed incentive models, appchains allow projects to design custom tokenomic models tailored to their long-term goals. This flexibility enables them to align incentives across users, builders, and validators. In so doing, they foster community loyalty while minimizing fragmentation and creating a foundation for sustainable growth. Embracing the appchain revolution The migration from general-purpose blockchains to custom appchains is not just a trend‚Äîit‚Äôs an inevitability. And it‚Äôs a positive shift for the industry. By embracing appchains, projects can achieve a level of scalability, efficiency, and alignment that was previously out of reach. For web3 builders, the time to act is now. Overreliance on shared infrastructure and general-purpose chains ultimately stands to limit growth potential, locking projects into inflexible ecosystems and capping their potential. By investing in custom appchain infrastructure now, projects can future-proof their tech stack and position themselves as leaders in the next era of blockchain innovation. Read more: 2025: The year intents revolutionize blockchain infrastructure | Opinion Author: Steven Gates Steven Gates is the founder of GoGoPool, a decentralized staking protocol on Avalanche that empowers projects to launch and grow their own L1 blockchains. GoGoPool‚Äôs L1 marketplace lets projects easily attract validators and foster engagement, making it seamless for anyone to build and scale a thriving blockchain community. Steven previously founded DeepHire, a video interview platform designed to streamline the hiring process. It allows recruiters to conduct one-way video interviews and assess candidates more efficiently.

title: Argentina poll: 58% lose trust in Milei after $4.6B Libra crypto scandal
body: In March, polling firm Zuban C√≥rdoba surveyed 1,600 people on their trust in President Javier Milei. About 58% said they do not trust him due to his involvement in the $4.6 billion Libra (LIBRA) cryptocurrency scandal. Since the scandal broke, public opinion on Milei‚Äôs approval has been divided. According to a¬†recent survey , 36% still believe in him, and more than half remain skeptical. Milei‚Äôs approval rating drops as public sentiment worsens Zuban C√≥rdoba conducted a study of 1,600 participants between March 12 and 14, with a 2.45% sampling error and a 95% confidence level. For the first time, the polling platform included a question assessing trust in President Javier Milei. Several key metrics have recently declined, including Milei‚Äôs reputation and national management approval rating. Zuban C√≥rdoba reported that negativity concerning Milei‚Äôs leadership seemed to have no end as it rose gradually but consistently. ‚ÄúThe change in tone and evaluation of the government is consolidating as more and more problematic fronts appear on the political agenda,‚Äù the polling platform said. Meanwhile, Milei‚Äôs approval rating fell to 45% in another University of San Andr√©s survey that 1,020 respondents filled out between March 11 and 20. Milei‚Äôs approval remains divided amid Libra scandal fallout President Milei is portrayed differently in each poll, though. According to Morning Consult data collected between February 27 and March 5, Milei‚Äôs approval rating was 62.4% following the Libra scandal. Since the scandal, Milei has distanced himself from Libra, claiming in a controversial X post on February 14 that he simply ‚Äúspread the word‚Äù about the LIBRA token rather than promoting it. Meanwhile, fraud lawsuits against his claim continue to pile. Shortly following Milei‚Äôs X post, the Libra token surged to a $4.6 billion market cap before experiencing a serious, constant decline of nearly 94% over the following few hours. Although they have not succeeded, Argentina‚Äôs opposition party demanded that Milei be removed from office. Milei‚Äôs crypto scandal threatens political alliances and popularity President Javier Milei‚Äôs meme coin scandal has ailed his attempts to forge political alliances before‚ÄÇthe congressional midterm elections and tarnished his popularity. The dispute started in February when Milei backed the‚ÄÇnew token Libra in a post on X. Libra‚Äôs price jumped to $5‚ÄÇafter his endorsement, and hours later, it was back to around $1. Milei‚Äôs critics accused him of being a rug-pull scammer who pumped up the value of an asset before a leading figure cashed out. The‚ÄÇpresident deleted the post soon after. Milei‚Äôs administration denied any connection to the cryptocurrency industry, saying‚ÄÇhe had been deceived. At the same time, a federal judge‚ÄÇopened an inquiry into the token‚Äôs release and Milei‚Äôs possible involvement in it. Although his hardline economic policies and anti-corruption measures gained him public support, the crypto‚ÄÇscandal has undermined his previously staunch support.
